Title: Management Recruitment Consultant
Description:
['SearchAsia Consulting is the leading staffing and
recruitment firm in the Pan Asian region, our offices span Hong Kong, Kuala
Lumpur, Taipei and more. As our firm deals with mid-to-senior level positions,
we ensure that we provide professional confidentiality for our clients, finding
candidates that suit their company’s culture and dynamics in the most efficient
and accurate way possible. As for our consultants, we offer regimented training
that allows you to effectively tackle the challenges of the job. New
consultants will be placed under the nurturing mentorship of our experienced
senior consultants, who will guide you into the fast-paced world of recruitment
consultancy.', '', 'Job Scope:', 'Sourcing, screening and selecting of candidates', 'Liaising with clients to find out their needs', 'Managing candidates expectations', 'Interviewing candidates', 'Cold and warm-calling to expand our database', 'Various forms of business development ', '', 'Job Requirements:', 'Bachelor’s degree in any field', 'Highly- motivated', 'Works well under pressure', 'Works well in a team', 'Initiative-driven', 'Likes interacting with people', '', 'Leadership and career
advancement:', 'You will also have the opportunity to work under inspiring
and nurturing leadership, our capable Team Leaders and managers are motivated
people that work hard and produce tangible results. Furthermore, there are
always opportunities to show your potential for leadership and career
advancement, some of our senior consultants are even offered the opportunity to
gain regional exposure in our overseas offices! ', '', 'As we are a home-grown firm, we believe in offering career
advancement opportunities to deserving consultants that have worked their way
up the ranks and have shown consistent results with great work dispositions.', '', 'If you enjoy meeting people and building relationships to
last a lifetime, this job is for you. Here at SearchAsia, we believe that it is
the people that truly make a difference. Be part of a fun, dynamic and friendly
workplace that supports and challenges you to always learn and grow. ', '', 'So, what are you waiting for? Apply now to [Click Here to Email Your Resume] and join our dynamic
team!']

Title: Contract Database Administrator (Pharma, SAP, up to $5K)
Description:
['', 'Main Purpose:', '\xa0', 'The role of Asia Pacific Regional Data Administrator (AP RDA) is to facilitate the creation and maintenance of high quality master data related to all Material, Customer, Vendor and Sales Structure for the Asia Pacific region. By implementing and executing policies and procedures at the regional level, AP RDA plays an important role in protecting a key asset: the master data that enables the company to share information, process transactions and plan and execute business operations globally. 

', '', 'The AP RDA team operates under Asia Pacific Finance, but it also works closely with Product Life Cycle (PLC), Procure to Purchase (PTP) and Sales Distribution (SD) Process Owners. ', '', 'Other groups the AP RDA works regularly with: 

', '', '
Key Accountabilities:\xa0 ', '', 'The AP RDA main activities: Data Administration, Data Stewardship, Product Lifecycle Management Facilitation, Process Improvements and Tools Management.\xa0 Out of the four main master data (Material, Vendor, Customer, Sales Structure) you may be responsible for the following tasks and activities.', ' ', ' ', 'Job Specifications:\xa0', '
Interested candidates please send a copy of your resume to\xa0[Click Here to Email Your Resume]

Title: IT Consultant at Panasonic Asia Pacific Pte Ltd
Description:
['•\xa0 Responsible for designing, coding and modifying/updating/fixing web, API , mobile, desktop and database applications from layout to function and according to specifications. 
•\xa0 Create visually appealing applications with clear navigation and great User Experience.
•\xa0 The goal is to provide a framework for the development of a software or system that will result in high quality IT solution.
•\xa0 Define all aspects of development from appropriate technology to coding standards
•\xa0 Oversee progress of development team to ensure consistency with initial design
•\xa0 Provide technical guidance and coaching to developer(s) 
•\xa0 Maintain and design Database and Application and File Server to Ensure Optimum Performance
•\xa0 Design Database Table Structures and objects to ensure high quality performance and flexibility to scale
•\xa0 Ensure Application and Database Level Security is up to standards ensuring minimal performance hit.
•\xa0 Create relevant documents and presentations with regards to System Design, Development, and final Product.', 'Job Requirements', 'Minimum 5 years of experience in mobile development using Visual Studio, Android Studio, MS Xamarin, IOS
General knowledge on Microsoft Office suites
Good understanding of good coding practices especially MVC pattern
Can work well under pressure and with minimal supervision
Able to cope and adopt to existing processes, methods and company practices
Able to do technical documentations.
Presentation skills when necessary.
Travelling might be required to support key users on UAT and hardware setup.
Good team player and communications skills.
Has successfully published and completed app/software lifecycle']

Title: IT Executive (Mobile Application) / IT Project Lead
Description:
['
IT Executive (Mobile Application) / IT Project Lead

', 'Responsibilities  ', '- To develop, program new mobile applications, as well as maintain and implement new functionalities and features for existing mobile applications, integrating with defined APIs, databases and infrastructure. ', '- To write and maintain clean, reusable and efficient codes, using defined IDEs and tools. ', '- To perform internal tests and code reviews to identify mobile applications-related bugs, bottlenecks and/or quality issues, and work with the relevant parties to fix and resolve the same. ', '- To verify deliverables against the agreed qualities and standards as per the approved specifications. ', '- To arrange, coordinate and conduct user acceptance testing (UATs) and user training sessions, with involved partners, vendors, stakeholders and end-users, and follow-up on reported mobile application-related issues closely. ', '- To create, update and maintain proper specifications, such as functional, technical and/or database specifications. ', '', '
Requirements ', '- Minimum a Diploma or Degree in IT or Computer Science, or equivalent.', '- At least 2-3 years of programming experience in Objective-C/Swift (for iOS) or Java/Javascript (for Android), with HTML5 and CSS3, along with 2-3 years of experience in working on the development and delivery of native mobile applications, is a must.', '- At least 2-3 years of experience working with MYSQL and NOSQL databases and tools, along with integration with web APIs and services, is a must.', '- Good understanding of mobile application design implementation (UX & UI) and mobile development concepts (e.g. MVC) as well as related technologies, SDKs, libraries and frameworks such as React Native, Node.js, etc.', '- Exposure to SCRUM and/or AGILE methodologies.', '', '']

ID: 119226\xa0', 'Responsibilities : ', '- Perform systems design to support operation productivity initiatives, cost reduction and breakthrough activities', '- Design, code, test, and analyze software programs and applications for\xa0automation,\xa0manufacturing system and\xa0tracking system. This software consists of both internal Micron applications and third-party vendor applications.

Title: Senior Executive (Enterprise Application)
Description: ['Reporting to the Director, Division of Information & Communications Technology and Manager (Applications Development), this position is part of the applications development team that manages the College’s enterprise applications. You are required to perform user requirement studies, database and software design, application development, implementation and providing technical support to users. In addition, you will be responsible for User Acceptance Testing, user training and maintenance of system documentation. You may also be required to manage and work closely with vendors to ensure operational efficiency and the smooth running of the systems to meet College’s business objectives. ', '', '', '\nPlease submit your letter of interest, current curriculum vitae and any relevant supporting materials, indicating current and expected salary and enclosing a recent passport-sized photograph, by e-mail to: [Click Here to Email Your Resume] before closing date 31 July 2018 or in writing (stating clearly the position applied on the envelope) to: ', '', '\nDirector - Division of Human Resources', 'LASALLE College of the Arts', '1 McNally Street, Singapore 187940', ' ', 'Information on the Institution and the position advertised above can be found at www.lasalle.edu.sg', ' ', 'We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified. Title: EVENTS COORDINATOR (CONTRACT)
Description:
['Job Title: Events Coordinator', 'Reports to: Events and Membership Manager

', ' ', 'Summary ', 'We are seeking a highly organised and results-driven individual to coordinate our events and membership services to enhance our capability as the region’s premier food policy hub. Reporting to the Events and Membership Manager, the Events Coordinator will assist in the managing the Association’s regional meetings and events pipeline, and ensuring the successful delivery of FIA meetings, conferences, workshops and summits.', '', 'The successful candidate will assist in the management of the database of FIA Members’ contacts and use sophisticated online tools to ensure the smooth running of FIA’s weekly committee meetings and telephone conferences.\xa0 These events are a fundamental part of FIA’s core services to Members and attract a high level of participation from senior executives from the food and drink industry across the Asia Pacific region. 

', '', 'The Events Coordinator will provide support in FIA’s regional events, including the AGM, Members’ Meetings and Conferences.

  ', ' ', 'Main responsibilities:', '', 'Skills and Experience:', '', 'Other', '', 'Interested and suitable candidates please forward your resume with your recent photograph and last drawn salary to [Click Here to Email Your Resume]

']

Title: Digital Marketing Specialist
Description: ['The candidate will work with the local marketing teams to execute the digital marketing campaigns for Singapore, Malaysia and Thailand. \n\nThe mission is to drive paid/ unpaid traffic to the ecommerce platform as well as to offline point of sales, and generate conversions (new leads, sales). This role requires a solid expertise of the digital campaigns platforms and is very operational.', 'Execute all digital marketing campaigns according to the Marketing roadmap, including SEO/SEM, paid social media and display advertising campaigns.', 'Measure and report performance of all digital marketing campaigns, and assess against goals (ROI and KPIs).', 'Analyse and optimise user funnels, tracking, audience targeting.', 'Identify trends and insights, and optimise spend and performance based on the insights.', 'Plan, execute, and measure experiments and conversion tests.', 'Work and liaise with internal designers and web team to deliver effective campaigns in due time.', 'Maintain our social media presence(based on the editorial/ promotions calendar).', 'Database/ email campaigns management is a plus.', 'Degree in marketing or a related field.', 'Proven working experience in digital marketing (3-4 years) and ecommerce.', 'Demonstrable experience of executing Performance Marketing campaigns; SEM, paid social media and display advertising campaigns (Google Adwords, GDN, Facebook Ad Manager, DSP, mobile marketing platforms) at professional level - agency experience preferred. From campaign set up to optimisation.', 'Highly creative with experience in identifying/ creating target audiences.', 'Solid knowledge of website analytics tools (e.g. Google Analytics).', 'Tracking implementation, cookie pool management.', 'Strong analytical skills and data-driven thinking (Excel skills mandatory).', 'Familiar with SEO and social media.', 'Experience in managing marketing database, setting up automated email campaigns (e.g. Campaign Monitor, Mailchimp) is a plus.', 'Preferred Skills : copywriting skills, experience with A/B and multivariate experiments, experience of mobile apps, experience with Magento. Certification in Digital Marketing tools e.g. Google Adwords.']

Title: Application Support
Description:
['', ' ', '', '', ' Infoware Systems (S) Pte Ltd

 ', '', ' Infoware is a software & IT service company group focusing on system design, business software application development and implementation, as well as provision of IT services and support. Our client base includes global, regional, local retailers and traders, and our Retail, Wholesales, Trading, CRM and ERP application software and professional services help them streamline and optimize their business and IS & IT operations in Asia Pacific region and other regions worldwide. ', '', ' To cope with our continuous expansion, we seek highly motivated and innovative technical professionals to join our teams, dedicating our technologies, knowledge and skills to render solutions and services that help our clients meet their challenging business and technology needs. ', '', '', ' 
Position: Application Support ', '\xa0', ' Job Nature: ', ' - Install and configure software application, database and associated operating environment. ', ' - Carry out quality assurance and deployment of application software and release updates  ', ' - Conduct user, technical and support documents writing  ', ' - Conduct data cleansing and migration as well as ongoing data integrity checking and rectification for different applications ', ' - Render on-site or remote end user training or support service ', ' - Respond to, prioritize, escalate as well as resolve variety of application or database issues ', ' - Interact with end-users directly for problem identification and resolution ', ' - Assist in implementation of IT solution, project and subsequent operation and maintenance support ', '', ' 
Requirements: ', ' - Diploma or Degree holder in Business, Information Systems, Computer Science or equivalent ', ' - With around 1 year’s relevant IT working experience ', ' - Solid experience in using SQL for data manipulation on Microsoft SQL Server  ', ' - Knowledge in various business software applications such as POS, CRM and ERP systems ', ' - Previous programming experience is preferable but not mandatory ', ' - With strong analytical skills and able to liaise with users at different levels effectively ', ' - Able to work independently and effectively as part of a team with multiple tasks simultaneously ', ' - Good presentation and interpersonal communication skills ', ' - Good command of written and spoken English ', ' - Candidates with no working experience can apply for Application Support Trainee

 ', '', ' Interested parties please email detailed resume with expected salary to [Click Here to Email Your Resume] ', '']

Qualification: 'N' Levels / 'O' Levels, ITE/ NITEC/ Higher NITEC, 'A' Levels, Diploma, Bachelor's / Honours, Masters / PhD
Title: IT Infrastructure Manager
Description:
['Responsibilities', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Deliver high quality, innovative, cost effective and secure IT infrastructure in support of the corporate business and manufacturing operations. ', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Responsible for ensuring efficient operations of server and network Infrastructure', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 IT service help desk (7 X24), Office Software Administration', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Windows server, VMware virtual desktop environment', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Open VMS, Linux, server administration', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Network : WAN, LAN', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 SAN storage', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Oracle, MS-SQL, SAP Database', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Citrix, Mobile devices management', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Supervising the IT support engineers and coordinating support functions internally and with vendors.', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 IT project management for IT implementation', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 IT Security Defense Firewall, Anti-Virus, Malware in accordance with ISO270001 standards.', '', 'Requirements', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Min. Degree in Computer Science, IT or related discipline or relevant experience is preferred.', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 At least 15 years experience in Information Technology management for medium to large organizations.', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 5 years or more years in active management of a team of IT infrastructure engineers. ', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Microsoft Certified Systems Engineer (MCSE) qualifications, Aruba Network and VMWare VCP5 are desirable. ', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 In depth knowledge of IT infrastructure technology including servers, desktops, storage, networks, operating systems, platforms and configurations in particular VMWare, vSphere, Windows server 2012 datacenter edition, Active Directory, SQL 2014 Server, Office 365, Windows 7 -10 Enterprise.', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 In depth knowledge of Open VMS, Linux, server administration.', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 In depth knowledge of Oracle, MS-SQL, SAP Database administration.', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Network skills:', "o\xa0\xa0 Switching (Capacity Planning & VLAN's)", 'o\xa0\xa0 Routing (OSPF, RIPv2, BGP)', 'o\xa0\xa0 WAN Technology (VPLS, VPN)', 'o\xa0\xa0 Large Scale Wireless Deployments', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Ability to inspire and develop team members towards best-in-class service and technical standards.', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Ability to work cross-functionally in matrix organization where internal relationship building and credibility is critical. ', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Excellent communication skills and prior experience presenting technical and management level presentations.', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Keen interest in and understanding of new technologies and how these can support the business strategy.', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Knowledge of industry best practices.', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 High commitment to customer service delivery', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Understanding of, and commitment to Equal Opportunity Employment, Occupational Health and Safety and ethical work practices.']

Company: One Marina Property Services Pte Ltd  (One Marina)
Title: IT Executive
Description:
['Duties & Responsibilities ', '\xa0', '1.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Install & configure staff PC, upgrade workstations & peripherals.\xa0', '2. \xa0 \xa0 Network administrator of MS Outlook / Email, HR Payroll & eleave software, Finance ACCPAC \xa0
\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 system and all Office equipment such as telephone, Copier/Printer etc.', '3. \xa0 \xa0 Carry out Preventive Work on PCs, Servers and Firewalls.', '4. \xa0 \xa0 Implement security measures on Windows systems based on corporate standard.', '5. \xa0 \xa0 Anticipate technical risks and issues to ensure that appropriate mitigation planning is in place to \xa0
\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 avoid compromising delivery.', '6.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Perform secondary data back-up on file shared drive and server.', '7.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Perform IT annual audit and inventory list on-site and review IT policies.', '8.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Prepare yearly IT budget.\xa0', '9.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Prepare Newsletter, ISO posters, announcements, e-cards.\xa0', '10. \xa0 Design and create effective communication for corporate events/publications.', "11. \xa0 Programming and development of company's websites and clients’ website.", '12. \xa0 Programming and development of Happiness Index Survey.', '13. \xa0 Assist in maintenance, training and support to Facilities Management Software.\xa0', '14. \xa0 Support off-site office staff on all IT related matter.', '15. \xa0 Maintain Visitor stations.', '16. \xa0 Maintain company website, database and intranet.', '17. \xa0 Review all IT contracts, look for best available vendor for cost/effectiveness.', '18. \xa0 Maintain proper IT documentation and records.\xa0', '19. \xa0 Any duties as assigned by the Management.', 'Job Requirement :\xa0

', '1. \xa0 Diploma / Degree \xa0in Computer Science /\xa0 Information Technology or equivalent.
2. \xa0 At least 2 years of relevant experience in applications development and desktop support.
3. \xa0 Proficient in programming (XML, ASP, C, C++, Visual Basic, SQL, MS SQL, Java, HTML, PHP).
4. \xa0 Proficiency in different operating systems in Windows environment and hardware knowledge.
5. \xa0 Knowledge of system administration, portal/web services and SQL database will be an added advantage.
6. \xa0 Knowledge is handling Amazon Web Services(AWS) updates and security.
7. \xa0 Knowledge of SEO will be an added advantage.
8. \xa0 Customer service orientated with good communication & human relationship skills. \xa0\xa0
9. \xa0 Proactive, team player and good learning attitude.']

Title: Senior Regional CRM Analyst
Description:
['', ' Our client is a global MNC and renown premium lifestyle brand in FMCG industry. They are seeking an experienced and talented Senior CRM Analyst (Asia region) at their regional office in Singapore.

 ', '', '', ' Responsibilities: ', ' Understand Nespresso customer’s behaviour and consumption patterns in order to plan and anticipate trends through statistical analysis of the customer base. Work collaboratively with the market to initiate CRM activities in order to increase customers’ consumption and build loyalty. Target and optimize all direct marketing actions through database segmentation and perform return on investment analyses. ', '', '', ' Planning  ', ' • Assist the Marketing team to plan CRM activities plan for both B2C & B2B with aim to build loyalty & drive consumption, taking into account International strategy & guidelines ', ' • Leverage on customer insights from data analyses and post evaluations and make recommendations ', ' • Identify customers most at risk of attrition and initiate programs to retain them  ', ' • Optimization of CRM/marketing activities by defining market sectors and customer selection based on customer profiling and segmentation ', ' • Initiate and organise mini surveys for deeper customer insights on CRM related topics ', '', ' Analyses ', ' • Interpret data to gain deeper understanding of our customers to develop customer-led insights ', ' • Identification of key trends and criteria that influence customer behaviour like consumption and loyalty ', ' • Spontaneous initiation of any analysis that can generate customer insight or operational projects to add value to the customer relationship ', ' • Assessment of CRM programs, related communications and promotional activities according to their efficiency and profitability ', '', ' Reporting ', ' • Timely & accurate KPI reporting on monthly basis.  ', '', ' Others ', ' • Custodian of customer database with specific responsibility for maintenance and management of customer data to ensure data integrity ', ' • Support local, regional and international CRM projects ', ' • Ad hoc analyses and projects ', '', '', ' 
Requirements: ', ' • 4-5 years experience in data analysis related to consumer behaviour and customer relationship building activities (retail or consumer related industry will be preferred) ', ' • Very good knowledge of SAS, SQL or SPSS a must. ', ' • Analytical experience analyzing big data and using software tools in a business oriented environment ', ' • Expert in CRM related tools such as Datamart and SPSS/SQL/SAS. ', ' • Strong commercial awareness; understand the business drivers, business environment, market intelligence, consumer behaviour and trends ', ' • Understand customer flow in Omni channel ', ' • Good knowledge of customer relationship management framework, strategies and guidelines ', ' • Strong interpersonal and communications skills ', '', ' 
Selected candidate will be awarded with a competitive compensation package and a rewarding career. Please click "Apply" to submit your application with your full cv (to include your photo is available) and include your current/last drawn salary, expected salary, your availability/notice period, and motivation factors for your next career move. ', '', ' For any enquiries, please write to meisee(a)thameshr.com (Reg. no. R1105612) ', '', ' We thank you for your interest in this application and regret that only short-listed candidates are notified. ', '']

Title: Language Coordinator
Description: ['', 'Language Coordinator', 'Job Title:\xa0Language Coordinator', 'Department:\xa0Language and Localisation ', 'Reporting to:  Head of Localisation / Project Coordinator  ', 'Position Based:  Singapore', 'Job Nature:  Contract', 'Position Level:  Experienced', 'Job Category:   Media Production  ', 'About TVT', 'TVT works with some of the world’s best-known entertainment brands such as BBC Worldwide, Discovery, A&E and Scripps International to bring their programming to the screen in multiple languages. We offer managed services such as versioning, compliance, translation & localisation and deliver programming all over the world. We take pride in delivering excellence. ', 'Purpose of the role', 'We are seeking an experienced and proactive Language Coordinator to work with a fast-growing team of translators / subtitlers. Reporting to the Head of Localisation, the Coordinator will manage a team working on high volume contracts. They must be well organised, able to manage their time and priorities well, and communicate effectively with both team members and managers.', '', 'The Coordinator is the primary point of contact for multiple freelancers, and the ability to build strong relations and manage expectations in this highly demanding and fast paced industry is vital. ', '', 'It will be the post holder’s responsibility to ensure that the client’s viewers never see badly translated programmes or poorly timed subtitles and have the best subtitle viewing experience possible.', '', 'Principal Duties', 'Coordinate translation, subtitling and QC of TV Shows / movie files ', 'Assist Lead Coordinator with recruitment and management of in-house and freelance linguists', 'Onboard new recruits and send feedback to linguists', 'Ensure timely deliveries to clients ', 'Facilitate project workflow and manage database', 'Work closely with global network of coordinators', 'Assisting project managers and team members with daily tasks', 'The post holder will have:', 'A passion for languages and translation quality and an interest in a wide range of TV shows and movies', 'Organisational, problem-solving, analytical and multitasking skills and the ability to pay close attention to detail', 'Ability to adhere to strict deadlines while working under time pressure; manage own time', 'Ability to adapt to workflow/process changes; resourcefulness when troubleshooting or dealing with technical issues', 'The confidence to reach out for support when required and to take personal responsibility for their work; open to alternative ways of working and new software', 'Experience, knowledge & skills required', 'Essential', 'Competence with Mac, PC and MS Word, Excel and databases', 'Fluent in English and a Southeast Asian language. Traditional Chinese (Region: Taiwan) would be beneficial.', 'Professional translation experience', 'Minimum one year experience of language project coordination ', 'Beneficial', 'Familiarity with subtitle quality control and audio-visual translation methods', 'Knowledge of subtitling software ', 'Recruitment experience ', '\n\n', 'Job Type: Full time – contract', 'Hours of work: Monday – Friday or Tuesday to Saturday', 'If you meet the above criteria and would like to apply, please send a cover letter and CV to: ', '[Click Here to Email Your Resume]']

Title: NVMQRA QUALITY AND RELIABILITY TEST DEVELOPMENT ENGINEER - SSD
Description:
['', 'Req. ID: 112171\xa0', "As a Non-Volatile Memory QRA (NVMQRA) Solid State Drive (SSD) Quality and Reliability Test Development Engineer at Micron Technology, Inc., you will be responsible for developing, debugging, and maintaining test programs used to validate Micron's SSD products. These test programs, and any associated tools, will be utilized from early in the product development cycle through the qualification till end of life. You will analyze and resolve failures that are generated by these programs. In this role you will work with various engineering groups to evaluate, implement, and verify corrective actions, as well as with production to provide support. You will be required to modify, write, and maintain code that runs on automated equipment to verify the reliability of the device-under-test (DUT) to a given set of conditions. Additional software responsibilities may include development and overall management of the SSD qualification database. You may also participate in the design and checkout of the hardware that is used to interface between the tester and the DUT.", 'In this role you will work with various Engineering and Quality Reliability Assurance Groups to provide technical support, expertise, consultation and training. You should expect to support customers both internal and external to Micron on an on-going basis.', '', 'Responsibilities and Tasks
 Develop, support, and maintain quality / reliability test solutions:', 'Perform device reliability analysis and characterization:', 'Analyze test failures to determine the root cause of the issues:', 'Provide SSD QRA test environment support:', 'Provide quality / reliability software support:', '', 'Education:
 Required: Masters’ Degree in Electrical / Electronics Engineering
 Desired: PhD in Electrical / Electronics Engineering
 \xa0
Experience:
 2-3 years of experience in any of the following:', 'Knowledge of Solid State Drive Product/Device', '', 'Qualifications', '', '', 'Site: MSB - 990 Bendemeer Road, Singapore 339942', '', "
 We recruit, hire, train, promote, discipline and provide other conditions of employment without regard to a person's race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity and expression, pregnancy, veteran’s status, or other classifications protected under law. \xa0This includes providing reasonable accommodation for team members' disabilities or religious beliefs and practices.", '
 Each manager, supervisor and team member is responsible for carrying out this policy. The EEO Administrator in Human Resources is responsible for administration of this policy. The administrator will monitor compliance and is available to answer any questions on EEO matters.', '
 To request assistance with the application process, please contact Micron’s Human Resources Department at 1-800-336-8918 (or 208-368-4748).', '
 Keywords: \xa0Singapore || Central Singapore (SG-01) || Singapore (SG) || Quality || Entry || Regular || Engineering || #LI-KL1 ||
 \xa0', '
Job Segment: 
 Semiconductor, Quality Engineer, Developer, QA Tester, Science, Engineering, Technology, Quality

ID: 113066\xa0', 'JOB DESCRIPTION:', 'As a Manufacturing Central Team (MCT) Data and Systems Engineer at Micron Technology, Inc., you will be responsible for developing and maintaining yield data systems, solutions, reporting and/or data mining tools to empower our organization to make data-driven decision.\xa0 You will be working across our global manufacturing sites, collaborating with Data Scientists, Engineers, Technicians or Data Mining team members to discover new opportunities, design/implement systems to extract yield performance and manufacturing data from Micron’s database, transforming it into a format that enables ease of yield performance analysis to enable continuous improvement initiatives.', 'KEY RESPONSIBILITIES AND TASK', 'Build Next Generation Yield Data System', 'Enforce Operational Data Quality', 'Design and Develop Data Analytics and Visualization Solution', 'Ensure a Safe, Compliant, and Ethical Work Environment', '', 'EDUCATION REQUIRED', 'Bachelor’s Degree in Data Science, Computer Science, Software Engineering or related field of study', '', 'QUALIFICATION AND EXPERIENCE REQUIRED', '2+ years’ experience in any of the following:', "
 We recruit, hire, train, promote, discipline and provide other conditions of employment without regard to a person's race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity and expression, pregnancy, veteran’s status, or other classifications protected under law. \xa0This includes providing reasonable accommodation for team members' disabilities or religious beliefs and practices.", '

Title: PHP Web Developer
Description:
['We are looking for a dynamic and skilled web developer to manage and take ownership of Wine Connection Thailand/ Singapore/ Malaysia websites. 

The web developer will do new site features and functionalities development, testing & deployment. For larger projects, the web manager will gather, refine and prepare the technical specifications for our 3rd party web agency.

', 'The candidate will also manage day-to-day functionality of the organisation’s websites and Magento ecommerce platform including: uploading/downloading new products, site maintenance and technical performance/ improvements.

Job Responsibilities:

', 'Experience with Magento.', 'Working knowledge of PHP, MySQL, HTML, CSS & Javascript. Wordpress is a plus.', 'Familiar with Google Analytics and Google Webmaster tools, Campaign Monitor (or similar Email platform).', 'Solid understanding of UX design, conversion funnel, user journey.', 'Bonus : prior experience in the F&B industry/ and or retail, mobile app.']

Title: Java Developer
Description: ['Our client is amongst the world’s leading employers and helps companies harness the power of innovation and have successfully guided the world’s largest enterprises and government agencies through successful change cycles. As a world leading independent, end-to-end IT services company, they are uniquely positioned to lead digital transformations, thereby creating greater value for clients, partners and shareholders, and presenting growth opportunities for their employees. ', ' ', '\nThe Job', 'You will be part of a dynamic team and be responsible for: ', '\xa0', 'The Profile ', 'You have at least 2 years of experience in writing code using languages such as (but not limited to) J2EE,\xa0Java, PL/SQL. You also have hands-on experience with Java Struts, Spring and hibernate framework. Experience of one or more full SDLC for enterprise projects would be a strong advantage. You can work well in Agile Development environments and any exposure to Application Servers like Websphere is a plus.\xa0 You possess a good understanding of modern software development methodologies (Object) as well as software testing methodologies, scripting and tools. You have knowledge of RDBMS databases such as Oracle.\xa0']

ID: 119781\xa0', 'JOB DESCRIPTION', 'As a Manufacturing Central Team (MCT) Data and Systems Manager at Micron Technology, Inc., you will be responsible for and overseeing the development and maintenance of yield data systems, solutions, reporting and/or data mining tools to empower our organization to make data-driven decision.\xa0 You will be working across our global manufacturing sites, collaborating with Data Scientists, Engineers, Technicians or Data Mining team members to discover new opportunities, design/implement systems to extract yield performance and manufacturing data from Micron’s database, transforming it into a format that enables ease of yield performance analysis to enable continuous improvement initiatives.', '', 'KEY RESPONSIBILITIES AND TASK', 'Organizational Leadership, Development and Communication', 'Build Next Generation Yield Data System', 'Enforce Operational Data Quality', 'Design and Develop Data Analytics and Visualization Solution', 'Ensure a Safe, Compliant, and Ethical Work Environment', '', 'EDUCATION REQUIRED', 'Bachelor’s Degree in Data Science, Computer Science, Software Engineering or related field of study', '', 'EXPERIENCE REQUIRED', '2+ years’ experience in any of the following and has proven track record of people and work management skills', '', "
 We recruit, hire, train, promote, discipline and provide other conditions of employment without regard to a person's race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity and expression, pregnancy, veteran’s status, or other classifications protected under law. \xa0This includes providing reasonable accommodation for team members' disabilities or religious beliefs and practices.", '

Title: Executive - Sponsorship Sales & Events
Description: ['Job Summary', '', 'The incumbent will contribute to Company’s success by developing and establishing new partners to meet assigned event’s sponsorship sales targets. ', '', 'The job entails promoting our range of events to new and existing partners and clienteles, as well as liaising with partners on events execution to ensure smooth running.', '', '', 'Main Duties and Responsibilities ', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Support team to plan, conceptualise and execute events, conferences and ensure they are successfully executed as per plan and within budget allocated.', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Managing operational and administrative functions to ensure specific events and conferences are delivered efficiently.\xa0 Provide post-event analysis, budget recaps, debriefing sessions and participant feedback such as testimonials', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Facilitate the production of events related marketing materials, including leaflets, posters, flyers, newsletters and e-newsletters.', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Assist in sourcing for new partnership, collaboration, merchant tie-up and sponsorships.', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Supporting in generating and driving sponsorship sales for all events', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Work closely with both internal and external stakeholders and to ensure effective communication amongst all parties.', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Acquire new sponsors and contribute to cover costs of the events', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Account servicing of key sponsors; developing and managing long-term strategic partners', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Cold-calling and handling inbound enquiries for events', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Developing and growing distribution channels (local and overseas) ', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Sponsor’s leads and database management', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Any other ad-hoc tasks assigned by management.', '', '\xa0', 'Requirements', '']

Title: Senior Analyst Programmer (.NET C#)
Description:
['', '', ' Infoware Systems (S) Pte Ltd

 ', '', ' Infoware is a software & IT service company group focusing on system design, business application development and implementation, as well as provision of IT services and support. Our client base includes global, regional, local retailers and traders, and our Retail, Wholesales, Trading, CRM and ERP application software and professional services help them streamline and optimize their business and IS & IT operations in Asia Pacific region and other regions worldwide. ', '', ' To cope with our continuous expansion, we seek highly motivated and innovative technical professionals to join our teams, dedicating our technologies, knowledge and skills to render solutions and services that help our clients meet their challenging business and technology needs. ', '', ' 
Position: Senior Analyst Programmer (.NET C#) ', '', ' 
\xa0Job Nature: ', ' \xa0- Conduct user requirements study and gap analysis ', ' \xa0- Work out system and database design as well as program specifications ', ' \xa0- Develop and maintain web-based business application running on .NET Framework ', ' \xa0- Conduct unit testing, system integration testing, data cleansing & migration and application\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0deployment. ', ' \xa0- Prepare system, technical and user documentation ', ' \xa0- Render support service and troubleshooting for end users in application operation

', ' Requirements: ', ' \xa0- Diploma holder or above in Computer Science, IT, Software Engineering or equivalent ', ' \xa0- With proven working experience in web-based application development, testing and deployment ', ' \xa0- Solid technical knowledge and skills in .NET framework, IIS, Microsoft SQL Server and ASP.NET\xa0 development ', ' \xa0- Proficiency in .NET programming using C#, LINQ and SQL ', ' \xa0- Familiar with Microsoft Web Forms or MVC framework ', ' \xa0- Hands on programming experience to develop applications supporting cross browsers  ', ' \xa0- Self-motivated with strong sense of responsibility and able to work in a team or independently ', ' \xa0- Good problem solving, communication and interpersonal skills ', ' \xa0- Candidates with less working experience can apply for Analyst Programmer or Programmer.

 ', '', ' Interested parties please email detailed resume with expected salary to [Click Here to Email Your Resume] ', '']

ID: 112604\xa0', 'Job Description ', 'As an FDC Engineer at Micron Technology, Inc., you will responsible for, but not limited to, developing/improving/maintaining Fault Detection and Classification strategies at our manufacturing facilities across Backend Operation, understanding system dependencies, project planning, engaging in cost reduction efforts, and actively participating in Environmental, Health, Safety and Security procedures. You will work with Manufacturing Central Team (MCT) Engineering and Backend Site Quality teams to provide direction and assistance with FD functions.\xa0 You will help to coordinate and implement FD control systems across multiple international facilities with the aim at reducing overall product & process variation which will result in higher process margins, increased yield and reliability with lower costs.
 It is highly desirable if the applicant has experience in using machine learning and statistical techniques to create state-of-the-art data products (decision support and decision automation data systems), utilizing extensive and diverse Big Data sets from our manufacturing teams.', 'Responsibilities and Tasks (include, but not limited to):', 'Qualifications:', '', '', 'Program Management:', 'Communication:\xa0 ', 'Education ', 'Required', 'Experience ', 'Required', 'Workplace ', 'Travel Required?', 'Travel Details', 'Travel Frequency', 'Travel Duration', 'Travel Type', 'International', 'Hiring Managers: Tony LAI', 'GJS: E3-E4', 'Site: Fab10', "
 We recruit, hire, train, promote, discipline and provide other conditions of employment without regard to a person's race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity and expression, pregnancy, veteran’s status, or other classifications protected under law. \xa0This includes providing reasonable accommodation for team members' disabilities or religious beliefs and practices.", '
 Each manager, supervisor and team member is responsible for carrying out this policy. The EEO Administrator in Human Resources is responsible for administration of this policy. The administrator will monitor compliance and is available to answer any questions on EEO matters.', '
 To request assistance with the application process, please contact Micron’s Human Resources Department at 1-800-336-8918 (or 208-368-4748).', '

Additionally, you are responsible for prioritizing inline parameters that need engineering attention, sourcing variation contributors on critical parameters, providing internal customers with SPC performance metrics, and providing CpK metrics to Micron Corporate to be shared with external customers for review.\xa0', '', 'Responsibilities (include, but not limited to):', 'Implementing SPC Business Process and Best Known Methods', '', 'SPC Training Development', '', 'SPC Metrics Definition and Delivery', '', 'Requirements:', '', '', "
 We recruit, hire, train, promote, discipline and provide other conditions of employment without regard to a person's race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity and expression, pregnancy, veteran’s status, or other classifications protected under law. \xa0This includes providing reasonable accommodation for team members' disabilities or religious beliefs and practices.", '

Title: MCT Big Data Senior Engineer
Description:
['', 'Req. ID: 120254\xa0', 'Do you have a broad theoretical and practical understanding of data engineering and data science? Can you wrangle large scale multidimensional data effectively? Are you always curious to learn something new? Do you love to solve engineering puzzles and optimize complex systems? Can you translate an idea in to an algorithm and make it into a product with quality and scalability in mind? Are you looking for window to the world ?', '', 'If so, you may be a great candidate for an Manufacturing\xa0Central Team (MCT) Data Engineer position at Micron Technology, Inc., a global, Fortune 500 leader in the semiconductor industry. This position will be based in Singapore.', '', 'As an MCT Data Engineer at Micron, you will:', '', '* Work with an international team of data scientists, data engineers, software engineers, process and equipment engineers, process integration engineers, yield enhancement engineers, R&D, etc. in a collaborative manner to develop new data science solutions that improve quality, improve yield, reduce deviations, improve manufacturing cycle time, reduce cost, extend manufacturing capabilities, etc.', '* Draw from a broad background of data-mining techniques in mathematics, statistics, information technology, machine learning, data engineering, design of experiments (DOE), visualization, etc. to discover insightful patterns in semiconductor manufacturing data', '* Work on projects and develop solutions that would be of high impact to various areas at all manufacturing fabs', '* Deliver polished presentations of data acquisition, data flow, data preparation and data presentation layer to internal customers and leaders to inform business strategy, streamline operations, and execute to revenue goals', '* In short, be a full-stack data engineer who can take an idea, access and prepare necessary data, work with data scientists to create machine learning models, develop it to an application with intuitive user interface, integrate with any pre-existing systems, demonstrate successful use cases and wins, etc.', '', 'Responsibilities and Tasks include, but not limited to:', '', '* Understanding business needs and strategy to develop data science solutions', '* Collaborating with other data engineers and business process experts to access existing data in data warehouse and big data environments', '* Developing new or enhancing prior data acquisition and ETL pipelines from various sources into big data ecosystem.', '* Preparing data for machine learning using appropriate steps and methods, which may include data cleaning, transformation, augmentation, enrichment, sampling, etc.', '* Working with various scientific data such as equipment sensor data and logs, image and various types of signals, manufacturing process data, etc. to extract meaningful information for analytics', '* Creating intuitive user interface for interactive data visualization to explain insights from data', '* Preparing and delivering powerful presentations with rich data visualizations and meaningful business conclusions', '* Documenting the train of thoughts used to design and implement solutions along with managed source code', '* Traveling and participating in various internal forums for strategy building and to build solutions in collaboration with various manufacturing sites\xa0', '', 'Qualifications and Experience:', '* B.S degree or M.S. degree with 2 years’ experience in Computer Engineering, Industrial Engineering, or any other discipline with extensive programming or machine learning work\xa0\xa0', '* Minimum 2 years of experience working in big data and data science projects and teams', '* Extensive experience with Java, Scala, Python in Hadoop ecosystem (Spark, Hive, HBase, etc.) is a must', '* Extensive experience with at least one ['SALES CONSULTANT - Recruitment

Phaidon International is a specialist global recruitment group. From our local hubs in Europe, North America, and Asia; we deliver permanent, contract and project-based recruitment services across the STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics) and Banking & Financial Services landscapes. As trusted recruitment partners, our award-winning network of micro-specialist consultants works closely with our clients to deliver senior talent for their STEM organizations’ requirements in more than 60 countries worldwide.\xa0

Our clients choose to partner with us because of our ability to identify, qualify, and secure high-caliber individuals; who possess the behavioural skills and technical requirements needed to bring about superior competitive advantage through cultural and bottom line performance improvement


Join the teams today!

['Our client is an exciting startup that is revolutionizing the F&B Industry across the region. With their rapid expansion across South East Asia, they are now recruiting a Data Analyst.

', '', 'Your main responsibilities will include: ', '\xa0', 'The Profile ', 'You have a degree in Mathematics, Economics, Computer Science, Information Management, Statistics or similar field as well as at least 3 years of experience working as a Data Analyst or similar role. Experience or interest in PostgreSQL would be an advantage.', '

ups, blogs, case studies to actively reach out to potential and targeted markets,', '●\xa0\xa0Use CRM to maximize online marketing opportunities, manage EDM and monitoring of return on investment on various online marketing activities,', '●\xa0\xa0To manage and maintain all social media accounts that are relevant to our marketing objectives, ensuring that it is communicated in a relevant way through all channels,', '●\xa0\xa0To develop and write informative and effective search engine optimized copy for the website and external blog postings,', '●\xa0\xa0Be up to date with changes and advances in social media, advising on new approaches and channels to reach out more effectively,', '●\xa0\xa0Use online performance statistics for all digital communications across all channels, using these statistics to influence future digital activity', '●\xa0\xa0To plan and organize exhibitions, road shows and technology update trainings, liaising and networking with a range of stakeholders including customers, colleagues, suppliers and partner organizations,', '●\xa0\xa0Collate and report back monthly on performance statistics for all digital communications across all channels, using statistics to influence future digital activity', '●\xa0\xa0Arranging the effective distribution of marketing materials, maintaining and updating customer databases.\n\n', 'Additional:\xa0', '●\xa0\xa0Segment lists based on behaviors like past email engagement and website interactions (content downloads, site page visits, etc.).', '●\xa0\xa0Measure results and optimize the lead nurturing workflows\xa0for these segments to convert leads into customers.', '●\xa0\xa0Work to minimize list decay and unsubscribes while increasing the productivity of our email sends.', '●\xa0\xa0Develop documentation and road maps for processes and promotions that succeed through email or calling.', '●\xa0\xa0Work with Trakomatic colleagues to set up programmes with partners or customers.', '\xa0', ID: 119595\xa0', 'Job Description', 'As MSB Test Process Engineer you will be responsible for optimizing process, tools and systems to achieve best in class product quality and productivity in Test operation. You will be also responsible for improving quality-yield in Test process, resolving process/product deviations (like excursion, RMA) in short turnaround time, driving continuous improvement in Test operation (through process characterization, process optimization, problem resolution and effective controls implementation), managing changes in test process (including new process/equipment qualification and new product integration) to support high volume production, identifying operational excellence (Quality, Productivity, Cycle time, Delivery / Cost improvement) opportunities and leading/participating in projects to realize the potential opportunities through innovative solutions. Additional tasks would include understanding and following QMS in place and ensure compliance to ISO/TS16949 regulations (wherever applicable).', '', 'Responsibilities', '', 'Requirements', '', "

Title: Inside Sales Representative
Description: ['Position Summary:', 'This position is based in Singapore (preferred but not limited to), and is responsible for managing the sales for Illumina primarily in the South East Asia region specific to marketing campaigns, products lines, accounts and/or sales opportunities principally via phone and e-mail. Includes engaging with existing customers, qualified sales leads and Sales Channel Partners, guiding customers to the Illumina products that best meet their needs, coordinating with internal resources to address customer questions/objections, providing budgetary pricing, creating and submitting individualized quotes and closing the sales process through the point of order receipt. Requires strong alignment to team-based selling approaches, working closely with the local sales and marketing teams to meet and exceed sales quotas for a specific product line and/or sales territory.', 'All About You', 'Responsibilities:', 'All listed tasks and responsibilities are deemed as essential functions to this position; however, business conditions may require reasonable accommodations for additional task and responsibilities.', 'Requirements:', 'Education:', '', '']

Title: FOOD SAFETY MANAGER
Description: ['The role', 'The Food Safety Manager (FSM) provides technical support to the organisation and its Committees of FIA.\xa0 The role is to support the Executive Director and the Head of Scientific & Regulatory Affairs (SRA) in FIA’s ambition to be a leading industry organisation on food safety capacity building and integration of food safety standards and regulations in the region in order to raise the region’s competitiveness of the food industry and to facilitate trade. ', '', 'Based on the knowledge of food safety and related legislations, the FSM will primarily be responsible for engaging with key external and internal stakeholders in the region, managing food safety capacity building and harmonisation projects for the organisation, advocating on key food safety issues that are faced by FIA members in the region, and other supportive roles required within the organisation. \n\n', ' ', 'Main responsibilities include:', '', 'The ideal candidate will have the following knowledge, skills and attributes:', 'Other', '', 'Interested and suitable candidates please forward your resume with your recent photograph, reason for leaving and expected salary to [Click Here to Email Your Resume]', 'We regret that only short-listed candidates will be notified.']

Title: Events & Wedding Manager
Description: ['Events & Wedding Manager', 'The Events & Wedding Manager is responsible in weddings sales and business development in selling banquet services and function facilities. It is the key requirement of this role to deliver top level of service quality in sales activities, communications and events planning and coordination in accordance with the wedding brand standards. ', '', 'It is important for the Manager to maintain the wedding showroom and building a wedding client’s database, in order to develop a local customer network to market potential repeat businesses.', '', 'Why join us? ', '', 'We are a new startup company that is incorporated in 2017. There are plenty of rooms to grow and managing is very important, by learning how to manage, we must learn how to manage from a small scale before moving to a bigger scale. ', '', 'Remunerations are attractive, when the company benefit, you will benefit.\xa0\n\n', 'Key responsibility', '', 'Job requirements']

Title: Fab10 Data Scientist
Description:
['Req. ID: 103043\xa0', 'Responsibilities:', 'Align to, Understand, and Prioritize Analytic Goals to Address Business Opportunities and Value
 \xa0•\xa0 Maintain an intimate understanding of company and department strategy
 \xa0•\xa0 Understand the business objectives in order to develop or establish success criteria metrics
 \xa0•\xa0 Translate business problems into one or more data science projects/solutions
 \xa0\xa0
Lead Efforts to Identify Signals in Data that Address Use Cases
 \xa0•\xa0 Understand business processes (data sources and meaning)
 \xa0•\xa0 Manage and optimize data discovery and cleansing
 \xa0•\xa0 Understand and collect relevant data
 \xa0•\xa0 Identify new data sources in the network that will create new insights to business needs
 \xa0•\xa0 Explore relevant data through visualization and statistical methods
 \xa0\xa0
Collect, Organize, and Prepare Data for Analysis
 \xa0•\xa0 Work with various volumes of data from multiple disparate sources and perform data analysis and mining to generate solutions to business problems
 \xa0•\xa0 Ensure processes taken to maintain data integrity
 \xa0•\xa0 Understand available data and what data is relevant
 \xa0•\xa0 Collaborate with data architects (IS engineers, BI engineers, DBAs, etc.) to ensure that data needed is available
 \xa0•\xa0 Develop and automate ETL jobs for various volumes of data
 \xa0\xa0
Uncover Patterns in Data, Develop Models, and Evaluate Validity of Solutions
 \xa0•\xa0 Develop expertise in data mining and analytic methods
 \xa0•\xa0 Determine statistical validity and significance (pick out signals from noise)
 \xa0•\xa0 Identify and apply appropriate analytical models
 \xa0•\xa0 Evaluate results using statistical methods and improve the model where appropriate
 \xa0•\xa0 Develop predictive models
 \xa0\xa0
Deploy Data Science Models into Business Processes
 \xa0•\xa0 Present findings and deliver recommendations using effective presentation and data visualization techniques
 \xa0•\xa0 Collaborate with software engineers to deploy data science solutions into production applications
 \xa0•\xa0 Ensure that the models are easy to support and maintain
 \xa0•\xa0 Regularly review deployed models and monitor for continual improvement
 \xa0•\xa0 Validate that the business value has been met', '', 'Requirements:', '', 'Location:\xa0Woodlands ( 1, Woodlands Industrial Park D, Street 1, Singapore 738799/ 1, North Coast Drive, Singapore 757432)', '', '', "We recruit, hire, train, promote, discipline and provide other conditions of employment without regard to a person's race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity and expression, pregnancy, veteran’s status, or other classifications protected under law. \xa0This includes providing reasonable accommodation for team members' disabilities or religious beliefs and practices.", 'Each manager, supervisor and team member is responsible for carrying out this policy. The EEO Administrator in Human Resources is responsible for administration of this policy. The administrator will monitor compliance and is available to answer any questions on EEO matters.', 'To request assistance with the application process, please contact Micron’s Human Resources Department at 1-800-336-8918 (or 208-368-4748).', 'Keywords: \xa0Singapore || Central Singapore (SG-01) || Singapore (SG) || Frontend Manufacturing || Experienced || Regular || Engineering || #LI-SING\xa0 ||', '

Description:
['Relocation Level:\xa0No\xa0', 'Hiring Manager:\xa0EDMUND TAN MING HUAT\xa0', 'Recruiter:\xa0STEPHANIE TAN\xa0', '', 'Job Description', 'As the Facilities Tool Install Engineer, you will be responsible for supervising and implementing the site plan and design for all new tool installation. It should also include the space planning of facilities utilities that routes from system to individual tool location. You are directly involved in equipment installation projects or non-routinely maintenance activities pertaining to the process tools. This position requires a complex understanding of the constructions function of assigned projects, materials, tools, proactive site coordination and good safety approach in the project execution.

 Your position requires the ability to develop solid inter-group relationships between internal and external customers. Your commitment and mindset to ensure compliance with local procedure, safety and quality as per site requirement.', '', 'Responsibilities and Tasks', 'Adhere to company’s environmental safety health policy and procedure, standard operating procedure with risk assessment, good housekeeping standard and policy when performing work.', 'Lead and develop for continual improvement of documentation in Standard Operating Procedure, Risk Assessment and Installation procedure.', 'Manage out sourced contract service provider to performance work activities in accordance to service agreement.', 'Control costs associated with your area minimizing regular expenditures and ', 'promote cost reduction projects', 'Ensure all materials and manpower ordered are needed and used to complete activities.', 'To perform site activities in accordance to Facilities discipline. ', '', 'Requirement ', '\xa0', '', 'Working Location :\xa01 North Coast Drive, Singapore 757432', '', "

Title: F10N WET Process and Equipment Senior Engineer//Engineer
Description:
['', 'Req. ID: 113184\xa0', 'Job Description
 A Process Owner is responsible to direct the sustaining/improvement efforts for Quality, Yield and Equipment performance for your respective process area.\xa0
 \xa0

 Responsibilities and Tasks

 Meet and work closely with Process Integration, Manufacturing, QA and other process areas. Send out periodic reports on process metrics.\xa0
 \xa0
 Participate in process and yield improvement projects and manage multiple projects.\xa0
 \xa0
 Partner with production and engineering ops team to determine and implement corrective actions for deviations.\xa0
 \xa0
 Provide guides, procedures and checklists for maintenance, equipment or process qualification, and reaction mechanisms.\xa0
 \xa0
 Apply technical knowledge and judgment in data analysis and conducting experiment.\xa0
 \xa0
 Able to implement process monitoring and control methodologies.\xa0
 \xa0
 Defining the process margin with respect to upstream and downstream steps\xa0
 \xa0
 Improving the process cost of ownership, throughput, and performance\xa0
 \xa0
 Reducing scrap and deviations\xa0
 \xa0
 Train and mentor technician or engineer to perform specific job tasks\xa0
 \xa0
 All team members are required to complete their learning items within the stipulated time frame\xa0
 \xa0
 For business process and/or QMS component that one is responsible or accountable for:\xa0
 \xa0
 a) ensuring the QMS/business process that is effective and conforms to requirements\xa0
 \xa0
 b) ensuring that the processes are delivering their intended outputs\xa0
 \xa0
 c) reporting on QMS/business process performance and opportunities for improvement to management\xa0
 \xa0
 d) ensuring the promotion of internal and external customer focus throughout the organization\xa0
 \xa0
 e) ensuring the maintenance of the integrity of the QMS/ business process when changes are planned and implemented.\xa0
 \xa0
 f) ensuring customer requirements are met', '', 'Requirements : ', '. Masters/Bachelor in Engineering', '. Relevant experience', "

['', 'Req. ID: 119313\xa0', 'As a Backend Central Planning Tactical Planner, you will be part of a team focusing primarily within the 0-13 week time frame with special emphasis on current quarter. Title: Fab10N Facilities Engineer (Controls)
Description:
['', 'Req. ID: 110441\xa0', 'Summary :', 'As the Facilities Instrumentation & Controls Engineer, you are required to lead engineering and maintenance works in the fields of I&C equipment and system on site, with the necessary guidance and direction from Facilities organization, to achieve facilities department, site, facilities corporate and company goals.', '', 'Responsibilities :
 • Adhere to company’s environmental safety health policy and procedure, standard operating procedure with risk assessment, good housekeeping standard and quality policy when performing work
 • Report and follow through work related injury and near miss to supervisor and actively participate in safety incident investigation
 • Attend safety training and safety committee meeting, when required
 • Attend classroom, computer-base training, skill certification and on-the-job training to acquire skill to performance job function
 • Guide, coach and certify maintenance team through classroom and site training, when required
 • Lead morning tool box meeting, organize and attend department and other organization meeting when required
 • Lead documentation in Standard Operating Procedure, Risk Assessment and Energy Isolation Procedure
 • Plan, schedule and supervise Preventive and Corrective Maintenance work activities, priorities and reallocate resource when required, on\xa0mechanical equipment and Instrumention & Control system under the responsibilities of Facilities organization
 • Lead troubleshooting and attend to abnormalities in support of Operations in a timely manner on\xa0system under the responsibilities of Facilities organization, when required
 • Lead and participate in\xa0equipment and system abnormalities root cause analysis, attend review meeting and provide update, then execute corrective and preventive action for continual improvement, this include installation and modification work on existing or new mechanical equipment and Instrumention & Control system
 • Support engineering and tool install on system capabilities analysis during scenario evaluations
 • Generate and maintain Scope-of-Work documentation for out sourced contract service
 • Manage out sourced contract service provider to performance work activities in accordance to service agreement
 • Utilize computer base software to document and analyses records of work order and equipment history
 • Maintain equipment and system maintenance record for work history traceability
 • Acquire estimated cost and rise purchase requisition for service or parts necessary for repair and maintenance purpose, when required
 • Track and monitor equipment spare parts and consumable inventory
 • Review Preventive and Corrective Maintenance work performance, recommend and implement continual improvement through new work method, procedure and spare or consumable parts
 • Attend Emergency Response Team training, certification, drill and incident, when required', '', 'Requirements :
 • Bachelor Degree in Electrical/Mechanical engineering or equivalent related field or equivalent experience is preferred', '•\xa0Proficient in Microsoft office', '• Knowledge of various handheld tool, portable and panel measuring device and equipment
 • Considerable knowledge and application of problem solving and data analysis methodology
 • Considerable knowledge of\xa0maintenance practices and procedure and installation work
 • Ability to perform\xa0programming of\xa0PLC and SCADA system', '• Ability to understand and use\xa0schematic, single-line drawing and related equipment and system documentation
 • Ability to work in a team environment with various professional level', '
 GJS: E1
 Hiring Manager: Sam Thai

Description:
['', 'Req. ID: 120766\xa0', 'Description', 'As a Senior Manager, BECP Data Analytics at Micron Technology, you will be responsible to build a profound knowledge of Back End (BE) Business data and be a subject matter expert in Back End data driven metrics and methodology. You are required to collate Back End Data portfolio and articulate key operational metrics to executives. to drive decision making. You will work in close collaboration with respective analytics teams across existing stakeholders e.g. Manufacturing sites, Sthe BE Data landscape. In addition, you are required to advise executives by providing technical and strategic reports that identify and address business issues and opportunities. This includes bringing together expertise and identifying subject matter experts in support of multi-functional efforts to identify, interpret and produce recommendations based on BE operation’s reporting and data needs.', '', 'You will manage a team of individuals to support Back End Data Analytics and metrics development which targets to accelerate decision making at executive level and for end users of metrics in key strategic areas of focus such Cycle Time, Cost, Quality, Scale and New Product Introduction (NPI)', '', 'Responsibilities', 'Build a profound knowledge of Back End (BE) business data ', '', 'Collate Back End data portfolio and articulate to executives to drive decision making ', '', 'Brings expertise and identifies subject matter experts in support of multi-functional efforts to identify, interpret and produce recommendations based on BE operation’s reporting and data needs', '', 'Be a Subject Matter Expert in Back End Data Driven Metrics and Methodology', '', 'Manage Human Resources', '', 'Ensure a Safe, Compliant, and Ethical Work Environment', '', '', 'Working Location: 1 North Coast Drive, Singapore 757432', "

Title: Junior Media Analyst
Description:
['Meltwater’s Enterprise Solutions\xa0takes responsibility for some of the company’s biggest clients worldwide by revenue. We deliver business-essential intelligence reports based on our keen analyses of various media outlets which Meltwater prides itself upon. Our core competency of high adaptability to client’s requirements and fast turnarounds comes from the unique team of individuals composed of diverse skill sets. We always strive to break new grounds, constantly focusing on solution-oriented approaches, at the same time developing every individual to his or her full capacity.\xa0', ' \xa0', 'Role & Responsibilities:\xa0What to expect as a Junior Media Analyst?\xa0

', 'Get trained in media monitoring, analytics & crisis management\xa0', 'Learn the inner workings of mainstream and social media landscape\xa0', 'Share and contribute best practices in Quantitative and Qualitative techniques\xa0', "Analyze mainstream media and social media content to draw meaningful insights to help clients' business growth\xa0", 'Work with a team cohesively to ensure all tasks are delivered on time\xa0', 'Able to work flexible hours/ rotational shifts\xa0', '
Minimum Requirements:', 'Advanced Diploma and above\xa0', 'Strong editorial writing skills in English\xa0', 'Fluent in one of the following languages: Mandarin/ Chinese and/or Malay and/or Tamil\xa0', 'Excellent report writing skills – experience in both qualitative and quantitative research\xa0', 'Able to work flexible hours / rotational shifts\xa0', ' \xa0', 'Preferred Requirements:', '0 to 6 months experience in any of the following areas:\xa0', 'Market research, data analytics or exposure to mainstream and social media\xa0', 'Agency experience, specifically a client-servicing role with report writing experience is preferred\xa0', 'Experience in data\xa0visualisation\xa0and using dashboard tools, Microsoft Excel and pivot tables\xa0', 'Good analytical and logical skills – able to translate data into actionable insights in the simplest and most concise manner, have an eye for detail, and ask “what does this mean?" to the data\xa0', 'Able to think critically – look at the numbers, trends, and data and come to new conclusions based on the findings\xa0', 'Meticulous – data is precise, exercise vigilance in the analysis to come to correct conclusions\xa0', 'Some familiarity with different research methodologies and basic analysis methods\xa0', ' \xa0', 'If you are interested, we welcome you to send us your updated resume, along with your contact details, availability, and portfolio of work (if you have contributed to articles / blogs / vlogs / media projects).\xa0', ' \xa0', 'Only shortlisted applicants will be notified.\xa0', ' \xa0', 'We look forward to hearing from you!\xa0']

Title: Senior PMO Analyst
Description:
['', ' We are looking for a Senior PMO Analyst for a 12 months renewable contract opportunity for one of our client in Singapore ', ' Salary: SGD 5500 – 6500', ' Job Description ', ' ● \xa0Develop positive relationships with key stakeholders and teams to enable the PMO to provide support including facilitation, tracking and reporting on projects and plans. ', ' ● \xa0Assist with establishing stakeholder management plan and implementation of the communication framework ', ' ● \xa0Act as a reference point for PMO queries and information and an advocate for best practices. ', ' ● \xa0Share lessons learned and best practices across programs, building relationships with stakeholders and brokering relationships at all levels ', ' ● \xa0Establish, collect, validate and maintain necessary information from data sources for the formation of reports and charts for senior executive reporting. ', ' ● \xa0Provide tracking of KPI’s across the enterprise and for key program initiatives. ', ' ● \xa0Able to work proactively, independently and handle concurrent initiatives. ', ' ● \xa0Prior experience preparing reports and presentations to senior management would be an advantage. ', '', ' Interested, please send over your resume to recruitment@aryansearch dot com or call at\xa0\xa0+65 67087429 – 213 for a confidential discussion. ', ' EA PERSONNEL: SHERVANI VIKRAM

Title: Senior Sales/ Sales Manager
Description:
['Heading the Singapore Sales Department, the Senior/ Sales Manager shall lead the team to drive the growth of sales and profitability; meeting the goals of the SPI group while fulfilling the expectations of customers.', '', '', '', 'Specific Duties
& Responsibilities:', '', 'Develop
    sales and marketing strategies locally to achieve sales target. ', 'Expand SPI market
    share and maintain current accounts through execution of strategies. ', 'Lead
    and develop the sales team in proposal preparation and presentation; pricing analysis and
    contract negotiation to ensure successful and profitable completion of projects.', 'Organise
    exhibitions, trade shows and conducting presentations to market the Company’s
    brand name and products. ', 'Provide
    quality after-sales service; including but not limited to technical problem
    advisory. ', 'Understand
    customers’ needs and strategically market the products to reach out to the
    customers. ', 'Gather customers’
    insight and market intelligence to win projects.', 'Manage good
    customer relationships by providing value- add service to customers.', 'Seek opportunities
    in value- add projects or new products to diversify SPI’s businesses. ', 'Liaise with Regional
    Sales & Marketing personnel on cross-country project execution.', '
', '', '', 'Job Requirements:
', '', '
    Diploma or Degree in Engineering; preferably with technical qualification in Precision
    Engineering.', 'Minimum 5
    years in a similar capacity; in the same industry.', 'Possess good
    market intelligence in similar industry. ', 'Strong
    technical understanding in Metal Stamping, Tool Making, Machining processes and
    costing. ', 'Preferably familiar
    with requirements of ISO 9001, ISO 13485, ISO 14001 & TS 16949. ', 'Possess outstanding
    presentation, negotiation, marketing and selling skills; good interpersonal,
    communication and organisation skills. ', '', '']

Title: Account Manager, Client Success
Description:
['Meltwater is the global leader in media intelligence and our innovative products help businesses extract insights from billions of online conversations and articles – we call it Outside Insight. With over 25,000 companies using Meltwater media intelligence and with more than 50 offices on six continents, Meltwater offers countless ways to make an impact in a fast growing organization. Meltwater has won several awards as a Top Employer worldwide and our culture is based on a fundamental belief in people and the potential they possess.', 'The Client Success team focuses on growing and engaging Meltwater’s user base. The account manager will be directly responsible in maintaining long term relationship with Meltwater’s key clients both in Singapore and the region – through consultation, education, and support with the aim of maximising sales revenue and upholding high standards of customer service. \xa0Success in this position requires exceptional consultative sales, coaching, and client service skills; a willingness to experiment; the ability to thrive in a dynamic, team-focused environment; and a passion for helping others achieve results.

', 'Responsibilities: ', '
Requirements: ', '
For interested applicants, we welcome you to send us your updated resume, along with your contact details, availability and salary expectation.

', 'Kindly note that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

', 'We look forward to hearing from you!', '']
