Title: Senior Manager/Manager, Marketing and Lease Management
Description:
['Job Description : ', '', 'Reports to & provide support to the Assistant
    Director in maintaining all existing client accounts; establishing and
    developing strong long-term relationships with clients and tenants; ', 'Work alongside with Assistant Director
    to develop and plan for business growth, source for new business opportunities
    and provide high level of service to achieve repeated businesses;', 'Compile, prepare and ensure timely submission
    of reports cover financial performance, leasing status & rental revenue
    collection to the management and client; ', 'Communicate financial & goal results,
    supervise and provide guidance to direct reports to ensure collaboration for
    shared goals; as well as meeting the achievement of target Key Performance
    Indicators (KPIs) for the managed portfolio. The KPIs are but not limited to
    occupancy rate, arrears rate, rental revenue and timely submission of
    deliverables accurately;', 'Key responsibilities involve ensuring
    efficient, smooth operation & effective management of portfolio and to ensure
    compliance with regulations; ', 'Responsibilities may also cover managing
    market intelligence and collating industry information to ensure
    competitiveness of the company’s products and services; developing market
    analysis report, spatial planning and concept & marketing plan to serve the
    needs of the client and portfolio;', 'Preparing and managing of annual budget
    and forecast for portfolio;', 'When necessary, work closely with Finance
    Department to handle finance-related matters including monthly rental billing;
    refund of security deposit; arrears management, execute debt recovery process, etc;', 'When required, coordinate with external
    parties like government authorities, auditors, professional valuers and other
    real estate salespersons, etc;', 'Responsibilities also cover conducting
    annual tenant opinion survey;', '
', 'Job Requirement : 
', '', '', '']

Title: Fab10 SPM Program Management Engineer
Description:
['', 'Req. ID: 108840\xa0', 'Responsibilities and Tasks:
 •\xa0 Represent Fab10 on the assigned category in collaboration work within\xa0PMO network.
 •\xa0 Ensure site centric projects and activities are proactively shared to PMO network through aligned platform and infrastructure.
 •\xa0 Ensure network activities that are of value to your site are implemented
 •\xa0 Manage and ensure program and project performance to the planned schedule, cost, and scope.
 •\xa0 Plan and schedule program/project timelines and record milestones using appropriate tools.
 •\xa0 Provide program and project performance updates periodically with communication across functional groups.
 •\xa0 Communicate with all key stakeholders to request feedback and maintain positive working relationships.
 •\xa0 Manage and control program changes including scope, plan, business rules, policies and procedures.
 •\xa0 Work with the project teams to identify project risks and evaluate solutions.', '', 'Education:
 •\xa0 Bachelors Degree or equivalent experience in Engineering, Science or Finance disciplines.\xa0', '\xa0\xa0\xa0
Experience:
 2 years experience in any of the following:
 •\xa0\xa0Semiconductor Frontend or Backend FABs
 •\xa0 Business Analyst, Management or Finance
 •\xa0 Program and Project Management\xa0\xa0
 \xa0\xa0\xa0
Qualifications:\xa0
 •\xa0 Strong business acumen \xa0
 •\xa0 Strong analytical skills and capable of summarize complex information into simple explanations \xa0
 •\xa0 Proficient in Microsoft Office \xa0
 •\xa0 Possess good teamwork skills and strong multi-tasking capability \xa0
 •\xa0 Self-motivated and able to work effectively with minimal supervision \xa0
 •\xa0 Strong influencing skills and experience with driving cross-function group issues to resolution \xa0
 •\xa0 Excellent written and oral communications skills \xa0
 •\xa0 Able to collaborate freely and communicate openly and clearly with co-workers\xa0
 •\xa0 Demonstrate excellent project/time management and priority setting skills \xa0
 •\xa0 Demonstrated ability to partner successfully with other groups and build strong peer relationships\xa0
 •\xa0 Specific expertise and detailed understanding within one or more of the following areas: Fab, Facilities, Procurement or Finance. \xa0
 •\xa0 Able to perform and advise stakeholders on risk and reward analysis for projects to ensure quality is not compromised \xa0
 •\xa0 Provide consulting, resources, and data on service contracts to the departments to enable them to implement benchmark structure.\xa0
 •\xa0 Experience and understanding of manufacturing and engineering processes and systems.\xa0
 •\xa0 Experience working with global teams is preferred.\xa0', "
 We recruit, hire, train, promote, discipline and provide other conditions of employment without regard to a person's race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity and expression, pregnancy, veteran’s status, or other classifications protected under law. \xa0This includes providing reasonable accommodation for team members' disabilities or religious beliefs and practices."]

Title: Sales Operations Analyst
Description:
['The role of\xa0Analyst, Sales Operations, is responsible for supporting & enabling sales across all our offices in APAC region throughout the Lead to Cash process. The analyst will have regular communication with sales representatives to ensure business rules are followed and implemented, while also reviewing the logic and efficacy of these rules. He / she will be required to perform analysis on different aspects of the Lead to Cash process to identify opportunities for improved efficiencies, and work on projects dedicated to improving efficiency across the organisation and driving key initiatives such as billing, onboarding and churn reduction. The role also involves working with a broad selection of departments across Meltwater including but not limited to IT, Legal, Sales, Accounting & FP&A.', '
Report to:\xa0Regional Manager, Sales Operations, APAC

', 'Duties & Responsibilities: ', ' ', '
Key Skills Required: ', '']

Salary: SGD 6000– SGD 7,000  ', ' Location – Singapore ', ' 1 year renewable contract position.', ' Job Description:

Title: Support Desk Analyst
Description:
['~Our client is a leading global IT solutions company. One of their key customers has kick started a regional project and in need to hire a:', '
Support Desk Analyst

', 'The Support Desk Analyst is responsible for providing our clients with ‘best in class’ service for any and all desktop-related issues they may have. The Analyst will be supporting clients primarily over the phone and utilizing remote connection tools from one of our offices, but may occasionally require some on-site assistance in the region. It is expected that the Analyst has a good understanding to troubleshoot and resolve issues that occur with workstations and some knowledge of how they interact with other network and domain devices.\xa0

 Position Responsibilities\xa0
• Provide ‘Best in class’ service and support remotely from the office\xa0
• Maintain a high level of communication both written and verbal, which includes full ticket ownership, following up to ensure issues are resolved in their entirety, and the end user is satisfied\xa0
• Resolve end user issues and challenges through the form of tickets in the service desk queue\xa0
• Communicate with technical staff and escalate outstanding issues when required\xa0
• Identify issues that cannot be resolved remotely in a quick and efficient fashion\xa0
• Document time and notes in each ticket as the work is happening. At the end of each day, time entries will add up to the total time worked during the day\xa0
• Work with and follow up with vendors and partners concerning their product and service issues\xa0
• Using a strong attention to detail, identify opportunities for improvement in client environments\xa0
• Build rapport and elicit issue details from end users\xa0
• Troubleshoot and resolves issues following company’s standards and industry best practices\xa0
• Identify issues that should be recorded in the knowledgebase\xa0
• Perform other duties as assigned\xa0
• Maintain an ambitious attitude towards learning and training for products both company specific and industry wide.\xa0

Position Requirements\xa0
• Certification requirement: A+\xa0
• Certification preference: HDI, if not HDI certified then willing to obtain within 6 months\xa0
• College diploma or University degree in the field of Computer Science or equivalent\xa0
• 1+ years working in a support, service, or help desk role\xa0
• Able to type a minimum of 45 wpm\xa0
• Knowledge of financial business level technologies\xa0
• Ability to pass the company’s Analyst assessment\xa0
• Exceptional written and oral communication skills\xa0
• Strong documentation skills\xa0
• Ability to absorb and retain information quickly\xa0
• Ability to present ideas in user-friendly language\xa0
• Highly self-motivated and directed\xa0
• Sharp attention to detail\xa0
• Proven analytical and problem-solving abilities\xa0
• Capable of Multitasking in a high pace environment, effectively and efficiently.\xa0
• Exceptional customer service orientation\xa0
• Ability to demonstrate client sensitivity\xa0
• Experience working in a team-oriented, collaborative environment.\xa0
• Outstanding client services skills\xa0
• Ability to effectively prioritize and execute tasks in a high-pressure environment\xa0

 Working Conditions\xa0
• Ability to work under a moderate noise level (i.e., working on an open floor with printers, telephones, and computers; or working in a datacenter)\xa0
• Ability to be flexible and successfully respond to multiple work pressures\xa0
• Willing to work extra hours as needed; including late nights and weekends\xa0
• Sitting or standing for extended periods of time\xa0
• Dexterity of hands and fingers to operate a computer keyboard, mouse, power tools, and to handle other computer components\xa0

 Performance Metrics (more focused on shifts)\xa0
• Personal CSAT score average above minimum global standards\xa0
• No ticket in queue over 20 days\xa0
• Documentation maintained in accordance to global standards\xa0
• Time tracking in accordance to global standards\xa0
• Tickets escalated in under 30 mins of work if not resolved\xa0
• Utilization above 70%

', 'We offer competitive salaries and our generous benefits package includes health and dental insurance at great employee rates, life insurance, short/long term disability, paid time off and holidays and performance incentives. Come work for the leader in cutting edge technology and see for yourself how we value our clients and employees alike.', '', '
*This job description is intended as a guide to the general job responsibilities and is not inclusive of every duty that the employee is expected to perform', '
All interested applicants should send their resume to: recruitment (at) aryansearch (dot) com', 'Only shortlisted applicants will be notified.', '
EA Registration number: R1103286', 'Licensee: Aryan Search Pte Ltd / License No. 13C6405', '
For all other jobs, visit: www.aryansearch.com/jobs']

Qualification: 'N' Levels / 'O' Levels, ITE/ NITEC/ Higher NITEC, 'A' Levels, Diploma, Bachelor's / Honours, Masters / PhD
Title: MCT BE Value Engineering Manager
Description:
['', 'Req. ID: 119063\xa0', 'Job Description', 'As an Manufacturing Central Team PIE Value Engineering Manager at Micron Technology, Inc., you will be responsible for working with leadership teams and program peers to plan and lead projects to close the gap between our competitors. Your goal is to enable Micron to be Best In Class for Back End Manufacturing.

 You will be responsible for Cost reduction, step reductions and RPT reduction programs/processes. You will also be expected to mentor SEAL manager and project managers to achieve specific business goals and objectives while ensuring balance in allocation of resources. You will develop and track metrics to predict results and outcomes critical to success of the program. Additional responsibilities include Governance/stewardship of business process, analysis of program progress using tools including (but not limited to): root cause analysis, risk assessment, resources consumption, interdependencies and gaps.', '', 'Responsibilities and Tasks', 'Manage Program Strategic Roadmap', '
•\xa0 Build and manage cost reduction and step/rpt reduction strategic roadmap, working together with Program sponsors and program peers', '
•\xa0 Work with Cost Manager and manage projects and activities', '
•\xa0 Manage resources and stake-holders for program roadmap', 'Manage Program Benefits', '
•\xa0 Identify and establish benefits realization plan and develop benefits metrics and monitoring', '
•\xa0 Continually assess benefit metrics and realization, and communicate progress to stakeholders', '
•\xa0 Balance resource allocation with benefits throughout program cycle', 'Manage Program Teams and Stakeholders', '
•\xa0 Identify Stakeholders and manage expectations', '
•\xa0 Collect and document stakeholder requirements', '
•\xa0 Identify and resolve issues and conflicts', '
•\xa0 Communicate program expectations to team members and stakeholders', '
•\xa0 Coach, mentor, motivate, supervise, and provide recognition for program', '
•\xa0 Maintain program support through interaction with senior leaders', '
•\xa0 Promote Program Management value and business practices to the organization', 'Oversee Program Governance', '
•\xa0 Develop program scope definition and approval', '
•\xa0 Set metrics and targets', '
•\xa0 Manage program definition and approval', '
•\xa0 Manage program change management', 'Initiate and Plan Programs', '
•\xa0 Define scope, goals and deliverables that support business goals in collaboration with sponsors and stakeholders', '
•\xa0 Define alignment of programs to company strategic objectives', '
•\xa0 Estimate the resources and participants needed to achieve program goals', '
•\xa0 Plan and schedule program timelines and milestones using appropriate tools', '
•\xa0 Delegate tasks and responsibilities to appropriate personnel', '
•\xa0 Create roadmaps for future projects with internal customers and stakeholders', '
•\xa0 Ensure alignment of program management business processes and training with area PMO standards', 'Execute, Monitor, Control and Close Programs', '
•\xa0 Identify and manage program dependencies', '
•\xa0 Track program milestones and deliverables', '
•\xa0 Develop and deliver progress reports, proposals, requirements documentation, and presentations', '
•\xa0 Control program scope', '
•\xa0 Identify potential crises, and develop and execute resolution plans', '
•\xa0 Facilitate transition of system and business processes from project close to long term sustainment', 'Develop SEAL Metrics, Benchmark, and Roadmap', '
•\xa0 Perform a leadership role to develop appropriate metrics and set goals with SEAL members', '
•\xa0 Perform a leadership role to develop roadmaps with SEAL members based on inputs from stakeholders.', '
•\xa0 Communicate closely with SEAL stakeholders to ensure each organization and group understands current status and gaps for those metrics, and forecast', 'Manage SEAL Programs', '
•\xa0 Support and manage projects through the project lifecycle', '
•\xa0 Assist project managers and business analysts to analyze business case and update program roadmap', '
•\xa0 Travel as needed to key stakeholders, project managers and SEAL members to ensure necessary communication', '
•\xa0 Publish consolidated reports to stakeholders and SEAL members', '
•\xa0 Conduct SEAL Summit as needed to review the whole program and discuss strategy with SEAL members and appropriate managers', '
•\xa0 Ensure strategic alignment of peer group activities, projects, metrics to SEAL strategies', 'Facilitate and Manage SEAL Meeting and Activities', '
•\xa0 Facilitate regular SEAL meetings and communicate with SEAL members to stimulate discussion among members. Use appropriate tools to make business decisions', '
•\xa0 Actively review SAEL program with SEAL members', '
•\xa0 Invite appropriate stakeholders to stimulate discussion when business needs exist. Perform a leadership role to develop and maintain mission and visions of SEAL activities Travel as needed.', '', 'Job Requirements', "
 We recruit, hire, train, promote, discipline and provide other conditions of employment without regard to a person's race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity and expression, pregnancy, veteran’s status, or other classifications protected under law. \xa0This includes providing reasonable accommodation for team members' disabilities or religious beliefs and practices.", '
 Each manager, supervisor and team member is responsible for carrying out this policy. The EEO Administrator in Human Resources is responsible for administration of this policy. The administrator will monitor compliance and is available to answer any questions on EEO matters.', '
 To request assistance with the application process, please contact Micron’s Human Resources Department at 1-800-336-8918 (or 208-368-4748).', '
 Keywords: \xa0Singapore || North West (SG-03) || Singapore (SG) || Backend Manufacturing || Experienced || Regular || Manufacturing/Production Operations || Not Applicable ||
 \xa0', '
Job Segment: 
 Semiconductor, Engineer, Manager, Program Manager, Engineering Manager, Science, Engineering, Management
 
 
 ']

Title: Manager, Data Science
Description:
['You will be
responsible for understanding emerging and evolving end user usage models and
requirements in Big Data and Analytics. You will document the usage models,
identify business, technical and user requirements, design solution
architecture to meet those requirements and specify an implementation hardware and
software solution stack. You will also document the solution architecture and
solution requirements, while also defining end user proofs of concept to test
the architecture, usage models and corresponding Intel technologies in test bed
or real end user environments. Working with the end users and ecosystem
partners, you will communicate project objectives at critical junctions to
obtain buy-in from all stakeholders and deploy the solutions in early adopter
production environments. ', '\xa0', 'In depth knowledge in the following area is
required: ', '\xa0', 'Expertise in Hadoop and other Industry Big Data
        Frameworks and industry vertical application for Big Data/Analytics', 'Firm understanding of major
        programming/scripting languages such as Java, Linux, PHP, Ruby, Phyton and/or R', 'Experience in working with ETL tools such as
        Informatica, Talend and/or Pentaho etc.', 'Good understanding of underlying
        infrastructure for Big Data Solutions (Clustered/Distributed Computing,
        Storage, Data Center Networking)', '\xa0', 'Requirements: ', '\xa0']

Title: MCT BE - Automation Change Management Engineer
Description: ['Req Id: 114002\xa0', 'Automation Change Management Engineer', '', 'Job Description', 'An Automation Change Management Engineer at Micron is responsible for providing quality system setup and configuration changes, system and process expertise, and timely support of system changes for the Backend Manufacturing operations. Responsibilities involve collaboration with other Micron teams, global and local IT teams, global process and equipment engineering, R&D teams, process integration, quality teams, production, and planning to optimize manufacturing processes and systems. The position will be highly oriented in support of the Micron Backend Automation Program and sustainment thereafter.\xa0 Therefore, requires proficiency in team leadership, project participation, data analysis, and problem-solving to drive issue resolution, product and process control, knowledge sharing, and strategic alignment of systems and processes. \xa0\xa0This position will be based in Singapore or in Taiwan.\xa0 It also has the potential to grow into a leadership role as the team in Asia grows.', '', 'Responsibilities and Tasks', '', 'Manage system setup and system configuration changes ', '', 'Provide system expertise and support for manufacturing systems, processes, and capabilities ', '', 'Facilitate manufacturing systems release and deployment ', '', 'Maintain effective and efficient contributions to team efforts ', '', 'Contribute to a Safe and Compliant Work Environment ', '', 'Education Required', '', 'Bachelor’s Degree preferred in one of the following:', '', 'Experience', '', 'Not Specified\xa0\xa0 ', 'Qualifications', '', '']

Description: ['', 'Req. Title: Data Steward
Description: ['Position Summary:', 'The Data Steward, based in Singapore, is tasked with managing Customer Master data so as to improve the usability and quality for Illumina’s SAP ECC and CRM ( Salesforce.com ) business users.\xa0 This has to be undertaken in alignment with Governance Standards and Commercial Business usage, requirements and processes. i.e. Campaign-to-Opportunity, Opportunity-to-Cash, Order-to-Install, Install-to-Support. He/She will monitor the data quality ( via Informatica and SFDC Reports/Dashboards etc ) and as required, will take \xa0corrective actions ( via SAP MDG, SAP ECC and SFDC Dataloader etc )', 'Tasks and Responsibilities:', 'All listed tasks and responsibilities are deemed as essential functions to this position; however, business conditions may require reasonable accommodations for additional task and responsibilities.', 'Preferred Education:', 'Preferred Experience:', '', '']

Title: AI Engineer at Panasonic Industrial Devices Singapore
Description: ['•\xa0 Provide scientific, technical and organizational leadership for the Artificial Intelligence.', '•\xa0 In-depth exploration of the techniques in terms of theoretical, conceptual and implementation aspects.', '•\xa0 Design cognitive systems, build applications and proof of concept solutions, create Intellectual Property (IP).', '•\xa0 Project planning and management, liaison with stakeholders and research collaborators.', '•\xa0 Provide expertise in machine learning (e.g. deep learning), data mining signal processing and etc', '•\xa0 Create technical roadmap, initiate Research and Development (R&D) theme proposals.', 'Job Requirements', '•\xa0 Master or Ph.D. in Artificial Intelligence, Deep Learning, Computer Science, Engineering or similar.', '•\xa0 Rich experience in computer vision, machine learning, data analysis and algorithm development.', '•\xa0 Strong track record of publicized papers in top conferences/journal, international competition, patents.', '•\xa0 Experience in technology transfer from R&D collaboration projects related to robotic, cognitive systems.', '•\xa0 Excellent programming skills in Matlab, Python, C, C++', '•\xa0 Demonstrated history of engineering innovation.']

Title: Govt Executive (Healthcare) - $13 per hour / Outram Park / Contract
REACTJS DEVELOPER
Description:
['As a developer, you play an important role in the product success of Haulio. While our Haulio transaction volume increases day by day, the Haulio product needs to expand further, reaching into multiple disciplines – such as web front-end development, backend architecture, containerization, IoT networking, security, data analysis and prediction analytics as well as storage optimization and scaling. Chances to learn and grow beyond your current expertise will be abundant for you.

The developer would be someone with expert level JavaScript and ReactJs Experience. This is a fast-paced position that requires a high degree of energy and ability to focus without compromising quality. We are looking for a candidate who likes to learn and will continue to grow their technology skills and mentor others.\xa0

Responsibilities:', 'Requirements:']

Title: MCT Yield Enhancement Senior Engineer
Description:
['', 'Req. ID: 96961\xa0', 'Manufacturing Central Team Yield Enhancement Senior/Principle Engineer', '', 'The position is part of Micron’s front-end manufacturing\xa0central team (MCT PIE). You will be part of the Yield Enhancement (YE) group, which is responsible to ensure all Micron manufacturing sites have world class yield analytics in place. You will collaborate with R&D, IT, external partners and vendors to define and establish best-in-class methods for yield analysis and data-mining tools. You will work with individual manufacturing sites across US, Taiwan, Singapore and Japan to continuously evolve and enhance best practices. You will be responsible to implement new methodologies and to support yield ramping of new memory technologies to meet the market volatility.', '', 'Required qualifications:', 'Additional qualifications that are desired:', '', 'Location: 1 North Coast Drive, Singapore 757432', "
 We recruit, hire, train, promote, discipline and provide other conditions of employment without regard to a person's race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity and expression, pregnancy, veteran’s status, or other classifications protected under law. \xa0This includes providing reasonable accommodation for team members' disabilities or religious beliefs and practices.", '

Title: Senior R&D Technician
Description: ["Keysight is the world's leading electronic measurement company, helping scientists and engineers address their toughest technical challenges with confidence through innovations in wireless, modular, and software solutions. Our employees leverage their insight and passion to deliver measurement solutions in wireless communications, aerospace and defense, and semiconductor markets with world-class platforms, software and consistent measurement science.", 'This job will be part of the Electronic Industrial Solutions Group, which provides test and measurement solutions across a broad set of electronic industrial end markets, focusing on high-growth applications in the automotive and energy industries, and measurement solutions for consumer electronics, education and manufacturing, as well as semiconductor parametric testing, nano-positioning metrology and material science. The group provides electronic design and test software, instruments, and systems used in the simulation, design, validation, manufacturing, installation and optimization of electronic equipment.', '', '', 'Job Description', '', 'At Keysight, we help companies address their toughest challenges with precision and confidence. We offer the most precise electronic measurement tools in the industry, with advanced software to match. Our employees leverage their insight and passion to revolutionize electronic measurements and make a difference in the world.', 'Keysight Singapore Center of Excellence is expanding in the areas of next generation hardware and software used in electronic product design and test for customers around the world. We are looking for people with a desire to be at the leading edge of innovative test technologies and has passion for creating new innovations. In addition, you will have the opportunity to lead/participate in the development of projects in the area of cyber security, data analytic, test and measurement products.', 'With strong collaborations & partnerships with local universities here in Singapore, the center will attract top local graduates from computer science, artificial intelligence, systems programming and electrical/electronic/computer engineering schools.', 'Responsibilities', '', '', '', 'Job Qualifications', '', '', '', '', 'Job Function', 'R&D', '', '', '', '', 'Shift:']

Title: Fab10 Yield Enhancement Engineer
Description:
['', 'Req. ID: 90402\xa0', 'Responsibilities:', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Perform detail data analysis using various statistical/data mining tools to identify process root cause and fail mechanism of yield issues.\xa0', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Work closely with Process Integration and Process & Equipment engineer to provide timely yield feedback to enable fast yield ramp to mature.\xa0', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Use knowledge of semiconductor device physics, electronics and semiconductor manufacturing process to explain and resolve yield issues.\xa0', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Participate in multi-area problem solving focus team to provide yield and failure analysis expertise to troubleshoot complex yield problems\xa0', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Prepare detail and clear yield indices and reports/pareto of yield deviation to the Fab team to provide the direction of process improvements.\xa0', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Serve as a key role in identifying and implementing new methods for yield analysis, and working with Yield Enhancement team to continuous improve YE process efficiencies.\xa0', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Engage other sister Fabs to shares Best Known Methods (BKM) and yield learning\xa0', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Coordinate in all Failure Analysis activities and characterization to narrow down process root cause of yield deviation and limiters.\xa0', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Support transfer of next generation technology from R&D to production Fab as and when necessary\xa0', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Work closely with RDA to identify and minimize inline defect gaps to end-of-line fails, and support them to provide inline die-loss for all defect related yield limiters\xa0', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Mentor YE technician on daily yield analysis operation.', '', 'Requirements:\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Bachelor’s or Master degree, preferred in one of the following: Electrical Engineering, Materials Science, Physics or related discipline and/or equivalent experience\xa0', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Possess a good understanding of Semiconductor processes, especially in NAND Flash structure and function\xa0', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Excellent verbal and written communication skills and the ability to present data in large meetings\xa0', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Excellent interpersonal skills with the ability to work with people at all levels\xa0', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Excellent organizational skills with a strong attention to detail\xa0', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Possess good teamwork skills and strong multi-tasking capability\xa0', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Strong knowledge of Fab process, good analytical and problem solving skills\xa0', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Strong understanding of electrical testing and characterization and device physics with a FLASH background\xa0', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Proficient in Microsoft Office and applications including JMP and UNIX\xa0', '
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Possess experience in SEM, FIB, and emission microscope', '', 'Working Location:\xa0
 1 North Coast Drive/1 Woodlands Industrial Park D, St 1', "
 We recruit, hire, train, promote, discipline and provide other conditions of employment without regard to a person's race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity and expression, pregnancy, veteran’s status, or other classifications protected under law. \xa0This includes providing reasonable accommodation for team members' disabilities or religious beliefs and practices.", '

Title: Intern Tech I
Description: ['', 'Job Description', '', 'At Keysight, we help companies address their toughest challenges with precision and confidence. We offer the most precise electronic measurement tools in the industry, with advanced software to match. Our employees leverage their insight and passion to revolutionize electronic measurements and make a difference in the world. You can join our mission to make a real difference through rapid solution development, turning measurement science IP into killer apps, on a hardware/OS agnostic, modern C++ foundation, delivered into an always-on, everywhere available, app store ecosystem.', '', "This is an opportunity to join a highly skilled hardware team at Singapore Keysight site. We are experts in the design and implementation of in board test solution for electronics manufacturers. Keysight's In-Circuit Test (ICT) System is a leading board test solution for electronics manufacturers to tackle a wide range of PCBA test access and coverage issues for today’s complex printed circuit assemblies.", '', 'This industrial project involves to characteristic the polarity of capacitance. In this role candidate will support the development of better, cheaper ICT system and get them to market rapidly. Opportunities exist to develop expertise in the areas of data analysis and ICT measurement. This may include requirements capture, performance analysis, design, verification, validation, integration, qualification and etc:', 'This project gives the candidate an exciting journey into what goes on in research and development project cycle; how a solution is created to change and improve the technology; how the software and hardware partitioning can enhance scalability of the product to build solutions.', '', '', '', 'Job Qualifications', '', 'Electronic and Electrical background with interest in Data Analysis', '', '', '', 'Job Function', '*Internships', '', '___________________________________________________________________________________', 'Privacy Statement\xa0', '***Keysight is an Equal Opportunity Employer.***', '\nKeysight Technologies Inc. is an equal opportunity employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status, disability or any other protected categories under all applicable laws.', 'Candidates can be considered to work from the following locations:', 'APAC : Singapore : Singapore : Singapore', 'Job ID :\xa029861\xa0']

Title: Fab10 Metrology Equipment Engineer
Description:
['Req. ID: 84888\xa0', '
Responsibilities
 • Develop equipment maintenance procedures
 • Set up tool qualification criteria and implement monitoring through Statistical Process Control (SPC) charts
 • Collaborate with Production and Process Engineering teams to optimize tool maintenance schedules and utilization
 • Develop and manage projects designed to reduce cost, reduce tool measurement variability, improve availability, and find solutions to ongoing problems
 • Liaise between facilities and vendors for tool installation, relocation and upgrades
 • Partner with the tool vendors to develop new hardware, software, and technologies related to process and hardware performance improvements
 • Write and publish reports that summarize projects, equipment availability improvements and cost reduction work
 • Ensure engineering team is trained on recipe maintenance, tool recovery, troubleshooting, and maintenance activities for the assigned tools
 • Drive process improvement through new recipe creation that helps to provide accurate and faster feedback to the line, thereby improving the confidence level of the product
 • Participate in world-wide discussions such as Copy-Smart Team (CST) for continuous improvement on the toolset(s) assigned across Micron fabs', '', '
Requirements
 • Degree in Engineering, Physics, or a related science field
 • Knowledge of semiconductor equipment and fab processes
 • Knowledge and understanding of Statistical Process Control (SPC), process control and its reaction mechanism
 • Demonstrate teamwork with a strong focus on developing good team dynamics
 • Demonstrate capability in managing and prioritizing projects
 • Strong problem solving and critical thinking skills to troubleshoot problems and identify root causes
 • Ability to facilitate meetings and achieve cross area engagement
 • Desire for innovation and is self-motivated
 • Good documentation skills with strong attention to details
 • Proven strong analytical and data summary skills
 • Excellent verbal and written communication
 • Working knowledge of designs of experiments (DOEs)\xa0 is highly preferred
 • Detailed understanding of Fab10 or Micron manufacturing systems is beneficial', '', "We recruit, hire, train, promote, discipline and provide other conditions of employment without regard to a person's race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity and expression, pregnancy, veteran’s status, or other classifications protected under law. \xa0This includes providing reasonable accommodation for team members' disabilities or religious beliefs and practices.", 'Each manager, supervisor and team member is responsible for carrying out this policy. The EEO Administrator in Human Resources is responsible for administration of this policy. The administrator will monitor compliance and is available to answer any questions on EEO matters.', 'To request assistance with the application process, please contact Micron’s Human Resources Department at 1-800-336-8918 (or 208-368-4748).', 'Keywords: \xa0Singapore || Central Singapore (SG-01) || Singapore (SG) || Frontend Manufacturing || College || Regular || Engineering || #LI-ST1 ||', '

Title: Senior Staff full stack developer
Description:
['', ' We are looking for a Senior Staff full stack developer for a permanent Full Time opportunity for one of client based in Singapore

 ', ' Salary: Open for discussion

', ' Job Responsibilities:

 ', ' ● Hands-on Design & Development, Deployment & Support of JavaScript based platforms, frameworks, and applications ', ' ● Lead and guide junior front end developers and provide program level architecture and design solutions ', ' ● Interact with Product Architects to deliver applications meeting Business Objectives ', ' ● Document and follow best design and development practices ', ' ● Create rich web user interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. ', ' ● Create server-side functionality using asynchronous, highly scalable design principles ', ' ● Take responsibility for feature-focused unit and system testing  ', ' ● Contribute to user acceptance testing procedures and monitoring results ', ' ● Contribute to performance and load testing procedures and issue remediation ', ' ● Work in DevOps model

', ' Experience:

 ', ' ● Bachelor of Computer Science or equivalent with 10+ years of programming experience in the field of Computer Engineering and Development ', ' ● Minimum 6+ years of experience in building scalable, secure & distributed systems ', ' ● Minimum 5+ years of hands-on experience with designing & building customer facing software platforms ', ' ● Minimum 7+ years of strong hands-on development experience with JavaScript and related open source technologies ', ' ● Extensive experience developing and running production application in ReactJS is a must ', ' ● Excellent working experience in Nodejs, ReactJS, Html5, CSS3, Jquery, bootstrap 3+ ', ' ● Proven ability to quickly grasp the implications of evolving industry trends & technology intersects ', ' ● Experience with building data visualizations, d3.js etc ', ' ● Solid understanding of functional (FP) programming in Javascript using current design ', ' ● Strong understanding of the Software design/architecture process ', ' ● Strong Hands-on experience/knowledge on Data modeling and Nodejs integration with NO-SQL technologies like redis, Cassandra etc. ', ' ● Experience with web servers & application servers such as Apache and Nginx ', ' ● Working experience with OAuth, REST, JSON, XML ', ' ● Experience with Agile Development, SCRUM, or Extreme Programming methodologies ', ' ● Solid understanding of object-oriented programming (OOP) using current design patterns/practices

Title: QUALITY AND RELIABILITY ENGINEER - MANAGED NAND
Description:
['', 'Req. ID: 111921\xa0', 'As a Non-Volatile Memory QRA (NVMQRA) managed NAND (mNAND) Quality and Reliability Engineer at Micron Technology, Inc., you will be responsible for managing quality and reliability of Micron Managed NAND (eMMC/UFS) products as these products enter into high volume production phase of product lifecycle.', '', 'You will perform reliability testing and data analysis on material associated with sustaining qualifications through change requests, product proliferations, special work requests and conversions. You will also take part in the management of product deviation events, through participation in product containment activities and providing quality and reliability evaluation plans for risk assessment. You will also manage the outgoing quality and reliability (OQRM) metrics. You are expected to conduct failure analysis from qualification, evaluation and OQRM failures and report the resulting data. You can expect to conduct global meetings to determine product priorities or product dispositions.', '', 'In this role you will work with various Engineering and Quality Reliability Assurance Groups to provide technical support, expertise, consultation and training. You should expect to support customers both internal and external to Micron on an on-going basis.', '', 'Responsibilities and Tasks', '', 'Manage Reliability evaluations for product proliferations, change requests, conversions for Internal and External CustomersDetermine a reliability evaluation/trials plan', '', 'Identify deviated material within Material Review Board (MRB)', '', 'Manage and coordinate various inputs from various stakeholders in Quality Reliability', '', 'Manage Product Outgoing Quality and Reliability Monitoring', '', 'Provide Expertise, Consultation and Training', '', 'Education:', '', 'Experience:', '2-3 years of experience in any of the following:', '', 'Qualifications', '', 'Location:\xa0 MSB - 990 Bendemeer Road, Singapore 339942', "
 We recruit, hire, train, promote, discipline and provide other conditions of employment without regard to a person's race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity and expression, pregnancy, veteran’s status, or other classifications protected under law. \xa0This includes providing reasonable accommodation for team members' disabilities or religious beliefs and practices.", '

Title: NETWORK ENGINEER
Description:
['', 'Req. ID: 95342\xa0', 'Job Description ', 'As an IT Network Engineer at Micron, you will be responsible for the operational health (Security, Availability, Performance, Interoperability and Reliability) of Micron’s data communications systems. You will support the acquisition, installation, maintenance, and administration of Micron’s data and voice communications systems. Network Engineers specialize in LAN/WAN, Wireless, and Telecommunications hardware, software and cabling. You will regularly work with Micron’s Business Units to ensure solutions meet or exceed business requirements. You will be expected to suggest, promote, and leverage published standards to minimize environment complexity and ensure regulatory as well as license compliance.\xa0', '', 'Responsibilities and Tasks ', 'Plan, design, and analyze costs of network (wired and wireless), voice, data, and video infrastructure for mergers, acquisitions, and new/existing site construction or expansion.\xa0 ', '', '', 'Provide operational support for network (wired and wireless), voice, data, and video infrastructure for the worldwide Micron enterprise.', '', '', 'Communicate the status of the unified network (wired and wireless), voice, data, and video infrastructure.\xa0 ', '', '', 'Education Required ', '', 'Experience Required ', '3 years’ experience in any of the following:\xa0', '', 'Qualifications ', 'Certified in CCNA, CCNP', '', 'Location: F10W - 1 Woodlands Industrial Park D Street 1, Singapore 738799', "
 We recruit, hire, train, promote, discipline and provide other conditions of employment without regard to a person's race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity and expression, pregnancy, veteran’s status, or other classifications protected under law. \xa0This includes providing reasonable accommodation for team members' disabilities or religious beliefs and practices.", '
 Each manager, supervisor and team member is responsible for carrying out this policy. The EEO Administrator in Human Resources is responsible for administration of this policy. The administrator will monitor compliance and is available to answer any questions on EEO matters.', '

Title: Storage Engineer (requires implementation skills)
Description:
['', '
', ' \xa0 \xa0 \xa0Responsibilities

 ', '', ' ● \xa0Design, Implement and support major storage solutions (like EMC, HDS, Netapp) and software solutions. ', ' ● \xa0Project Planning and administrating major portions of implementation which include designing/architecting solutions, scoping and write detailed technical documents such as Statement of Work, Build Document, etc. ', ' ● \xa0Able to carry out data migration and upgrades accross the storage systems and range of products and productivity tools that support the testing and production of those storage systems. Performing SAN fabrics upgrade or migration like Brocade, Cisco or McData. ', ' ● \xa0Consulting tasks like understanding customer and translating them to system solution. ', ' ● \xa0Conducting operation and maintanence training within internal functions as well as externally. ', ' ● \xa0Serve as a Subject Matter Expert on EMC SAN Technologies. ', ' ● \xa0Regularly interface with technical and business staff of client, including project sponsor and stakeholders of project in more complex engagements. ', ' ● \xa0Work with Professional Service Managers, Project Managers and customers to manager expectation and timelines to ensure expectations and commitments are being met. ', ' ● \xa0Conducts/lead design workshop (POC) for complex designs to meet customer, business and technical objective. ', ' ● \xa0Working closely with vendors to address, track, execute and ensure proper closure of system support. ', ' ● \xa0Responsible for analyzing and documenting incident defect and communicating the incident priority to the necessary levels of management. ', ' ● \xa0To stay abreast of new rapidly changing technologies and new product releases by regularly participating in new product and technology transfer training.', ' Requirements:

 ', '', '', ' 
Degree or Diploma in Computer Science or Equivalent ', ' Minimum 3-5 years of relevant working experience in implementing EMC Clariion Storage Solutions with RecoverPoint Replication, Recover Manager, EMC Powerpath VE, Symantec Volume Manager. ', ' Must be proficient in EMC Unisphere, Cisco Fabric Manager ', ' Good Host level knowledge (UNIX, Windows) on Volume Manager (LVM, VxVM), setting up storage on host level end-to-end in high availability technologies like clustering , virtualization, etc (detecting LUNs, formatting, multipathing, filesystem creation and troubleshooting,etc) ', ' Good Knowledge of networking and distributed computing concepts, including the principles of network routing and client/server computing. ', ' Good experience working on SAN Switches (CISCO MDS 9XXX, Brocade 300,2800,3800,4100,4900,48000) ', ' Proficient in UNIX & Intel operating System. Certification is a plus. ', ' Must have one or more of the following credentials: ', ' EMC Certified Clariion Implementation Engineer / Specialist / Expert (EMCIE) ', ' EMC Cerified Clariion Technology Architect (EMCTA) ', ' Experience working on tiered storage concepts ', ' Shell and Perl Scripting for automation ', ' Experience in administrating and configuring data replication, storage migration. ', ' Self-motivated, dynamic, proactive & customer oriented attitude to be able to work on tight schedule\xa0 ', ' Excellent verbal/written communication and interpersonal skills are needed in order to work successfully with customers and cross-functional teams to meet performance and organization goals. ', '', '']

Title: Electrical and Instrument Supervisor
Description: ['As part of its expansion in the Asia Pacific, Syngenta is building a formulation plant in Singapore.\xa0 This role offers a rare opportunity to be part of a pioneering team building the company standards and ways of working from scratch.\xa0 The Electrical and Instrument Supervisor will ensure all electrical and instrument are in good condition and plan and perform preventive, predictive and corrective E&I maintenance in a safe manner at all time. You will manage and optimize of E&I spare parts and tools.']

Title: Engineer 2 - Process Development
Description: ['Basic Function and Scope of the Position:', 'Be part of a highly dynamic and competent Engineering Team who is responsible to meet the quality, productivity and cost targets in a high volume, multi-product and life science regulated environment through developing effective world class engineering solutions.', 'Process Development Engineer serves an important role in ensuring that the product is transferred, manufactured and delivered at the utmost quality to the customer. The individual will interact extensively with other departments such as research and development, manufacturing, tooling, facilities, supply chain and quality assurance to develop processes for new products, sustain and improve processes for existing products.\n\xa0', '\xa0Roles and Responsibilities:', 'All listed tasks and responsibilities are deemed as essential functions to this position; however, business conditions may require reasonable accommodations for additional tasks and responsibilities.', 'Preferred Experiential Background:', 'Competencies:', 'Demonstrates leadership in the development of technical innovations and in ensuring optimum collaboration and knowledge sharing of technical insights.', 'Actively works to resolve project challenges and facilitate knowledge transfer between team members focused on shared objectives.', 'Demonstrates motivation to build deeper technical depth in area-of-expertise, and inform that knowledge base through understanding of associated areas.', 'Ensures that a positive customer experience informs both the approach to work, the quality demonstrated, and the endpoint for measuring success.', 'Understands how businesses operate and uses this context to drive innovation and ethical decision-making.', 'Develops methods for supporting innovation and change across the organization.', 'Approaches problems in a rational manner using sound strategies that ensure comprehensive understanding and effective resolution.', '', '']

Title: Integration Scientist 1
Description: ['As an Integration Scientist at Illumina you will work in a dynamic, team-oriented environment and help create genomic analysis tools used in cutting edge research and clinical applications. You will participate in the development of high quality, robust products through the integration of hardware, software, and chemistry components. You will also design and execute test plans and optimize system performance. A major part of the role will be to work with manufacturing to ensure that our products are fully tested and diagnose any issues through troubleshooting experiments and root cause analysis.\n\n Job Duties include but are not limited to:', '', 'Education and Experience:', '', '']

Title: Backend Manufacturing Central Team Yield Engineer
Description:
['', 'Req. ID: 113859\xa0', 'JOB DESCRIPTION', 'The position is part of Yield Engineering (YE) group in Micron’s Manufacturing Central Team - Backend (MCT-BE), responsible for manufacturing yield improvement program in the network to facilitate each site to meet business plans.\xa0 This will be done in collaboration with BE HVM sites and other engineering groups (Front-End, PE, TPCE, APTD) to ramp up the yields, leverage on yield learnings, and understand gaps and challenges to achieve the target yield performance.\xa0 You are also responsible to ensure the new data/methods/lesson learnt are documented as next package technology BKM.', '', 'KEY RESPONSIBILITIES and TASKS', '', 'STRATEGIC YIELD LEADERSHIP ', '', 'TACTICAL YIELD ENCHANCEMENT', '', 'COMMUNICATION', '', 'SAFETY', '', 'EDUCATION, EXPERIENCE & QUALIFICATION REQUIRED', "

Title: NVE Product Engineer
Description:
['', 'Req. ID: 109265\xa0', 'As a Product Engineer at Micron, you will be responsible in developing, validating, characterizing, and qualifying new state-of-the-art\xa0NAND Flash memory products. You will also be responsible for enabling and sustaining volume manufacturing over the lifecycle of the product. You will run simulations, create and maintain design documentation, analyze parametric data, determine the product operating window, and debug/solve yield, quality and reliability failures. In this role, you will also work with various Engineering and Manufacturing groups to troubleshoot, develop and validate device testing programs, and modify tests for customer returns to meet specific product requirements. Product Engineers are the key product-specific point of contact for critical issues and act as the main interface between Research and Development, Manufacturing, Marketing, and Quality Assurance departments.', '', 'Responsibilities:', '', 'Requirements:', "
 We recruit, hire, train, promote, discipline and provide other conditions of employment without regard to a person's race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity and expression, pregnancy, veteran’s status, or other classifications protected under law. \xa0This includes providing reasonable accommodation for team members' disabilities or religious beliefs and practices.", '

Title: Senior/ Software Engineer
Description: ['Headquartered in Singapore, vCargo Cloud (VCC) is the leading Infocomm Technology (ICT) solutions and service provider in Asia, specialize in offering technological solutions to governments and enterprises worldwide, in the domain of trade and logistics. We provide e-trade and e-freight solutions through VCC CamelONE platform, connecting key stakeholders in the trade and logistics industry globally; including government agencies, traders, freight forwarders, carriers and financial institutions.\xa0', 'Backed by a team of experienced and dedicated IT and logistics professionals, VCC revolutionizes the e-logistics marketplace through designing and providing an IT infrastructure consisting of a cloud messaging platform that enables the exchange of digitalised data for cargo and financial information, allowing stakeholders in trade, logistics and supply chain to communicate and collaborate virtually on the platform, simplifying cross-border trade.\xa0', 'On an international level, VCC’s strategic partners include Asian Development Bank, International Air Transport Association, International Federation of Freight Forwarders Associations, Kenya Trade Network Agency, Mauritius Network Services. Additionally, we also work closely with Singapore government agencies including CAAS, Enterprise Singapore, IMDA, SCE, Singapore Customs, as well as chambers and industrial associations.\xa0', 'To find out more about VCC’s product and service offerings, visit www.vcargocloud.com', 'About VCC', 'Headquartered in Singapore, vCargo Cloud (VCC) is the leading Infocomm Technology (ICT) solutions and service provider in Asia, specialize in offering technological solutions to governments and enterprises worldwide, in the domain of trade and logistics. We provide e-trade and e-freight solutions through VCC CamelONE platform, connecting key stakeholders in the trade and logistics industry globally; including government agencies, traders, freight forwarders, carriers and financial institutions.\xa0', 'Backed by a team of experienced and dedicated IT and logistics professionals, VCC revolutionizes the e-logistics marketplace through designing and providing an IT infrastructure consisting of a cloud messaging platform that enables the exchange of digitalised data for cargo and financial information, allowing stakeholders in trade, logistics and supply chain to communicate and collaborate virtually on the platform, simplifying cross-border trade.\xa0', 'On an international level, VCC’s strategic partners include Asian Development Bank, International Air Transport Association, International Federation of Freight Forwarders Associations, Kenya Trade Network Agency, Mauritius Network Services. Additionally, we also work closely with Singapore government agencies including CAAS, Enterprise Singapore, IMDA, SCE, Singapore Customs, as well as chambers and industrial associations.\xa0', 'To find out more about VCC’s product and service offerings, visit www.vcargocloud.com', 'Summary of Position', 'As a Java/J2EE professional, you will be part of our technical team to develop and maintain business solutions for supply chain and trade facilitation.\xa0 You will participate in the full software development life cycle from requirements gathering, design, coding, testing and post-implementation support.\xa0 You will also be a member in the team to drive innovation and embracing on new technologies to deliver cutting edge solutions for our clients.\xa0', 'Responsibilities', 'Requirements', 'Essential:', 'Preferred:']

Title: GQ - NVM QRA SENIOR / ENGINEER (RMA)
Description:
['', 'Req. ID: 117993\xa0', 'As a\xa0NVM QRA\xa0Engineer at Micron Technology, you will be responsible for performing formal Failure Analysis of customer reported failing devices via the Returned Material Authorization (RMA) process. You will be required to summarize lab analysis results at the electrical and physical level to identify root cause and establish an associated containment plan. In this role, you will have the opportunities to collaborate with various engineering and manufacturing stakeholders to evaluate and review Corrective Actions /Preventive Actions. You will provide documentation of the RMA findings and oversee the final customer report till closure. In addition, for the senior role, you will be asked to provide guidance and lead the team when solving complex unplanned deviations reported by our customers. Project management skills are necessary and the ability to make critical decisions that directly translate to quality and timely completion of the project is highly desirable. You will also be required to spearhead the sustaining efforts and keeping up to date on new product knowledge, as well as developing and mentoring new talents.', '', 'Responsibilities and Tasks', 'Perform Failure Analysis of Customer Returns', '', 'Provide FA Reports for Micron Customer Facing Team for Communication to External Customers', '', 'Sustain Knowledge of Device Capabilities and Characteristics', '', 'Qualifications and Experience', '', '', 'Candidates with 2- 4 years of experience in the semiconductor industry as Product or QA engineer are preferred. Candidates with relevant experience will be considered for the Senior Role.', '
Education
 A Bachelor or Masters Degree in Electrical Engineering or similar field of study.
 \xa0', 'Location: \xa0MSB - 990 Bendemeer Road, Singapore 339942', "
 We recruit, hire, train, promote, discipline and provide other conditions of employment without regard to a person's race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity and expression, pregnancy, veteran’s status, or other classifications protected under law. \xa0This includes providing reasonable accommodation for team members' disabilities or religious beliefs and practices.", '

 To request assistance with the application process, please contact Micron’s Human Resources Department at 1-800-336-8918 (or 208-368-4748).', '

Description:
['', 'Job Description', '', 'At Keysight, we help companies address their toughest challenges with precision and confidence. We offer the most precise electronic measurement tools in the industry, with advanced software to match. Our employees leverage their insight and passion to revolutionize electronic measurements and make a difference in the world.', 'Keysight Singapore Center of Excellence is expanding in the areas of next generation hardware and software manufacturing test technologies used in electronic product design and test for customers around the world. We are looking for people with a desire to be at the leading edge of innovative test technologies and has passion for creating new innovations. In addition, you will have the opportunity to lead/participate in the development of projects in the area of cyber security, data analytic, test and measurement products.', 'With strong collaborations & partnerships with local universities here in Singapore, the center will attract top local graduates from computer science, artificial intelligence, systems programming and electrical/electronic/computer engineering schools.', 'Responsibilities', '', '', '', 'Job Qualifications', '

Title: Fab10 QEM PQE C1+ Yield Engineering Engineer/Senior Engineer
Description:
['', 'Req. ID: 121342\xa0', 'As a QEM PQE Engineer at Micron Technology, Inc., you will support the semiconductor memory manufacturing efforts for developing, validating, characterizing, and qualifying new non-volatile memory products, enabling volume manufacturing with improved frontend C1/C1+ test yields as well as backend OPS/PTS/Cum Yield performance and enhance overall reliability by supporting the team in doing yield and failure analysis to identify root cause fail signatures and other C1/C1+ yield limiters. You will be responsible for the development of memory-test patterns, analyzing electrical failures, improvement of yield\xa0as well as overall cell performance, debug, design, simulation and implementation of circuit and process changes on test chips.\xa0 You will leverage an understanding of electrical operation and current fabrication technology of advanced DRAM/NAND memory products. You will be expected to do high level bench electrical characterization and how physical defects and process problems relate to electrical signatures. You will be expected to interact with engineers and technicians across multiple sites responsible for corrective actions (Design, Product Engineering, Research & Development, Test, Quality and Reliability Assurance).', 'Responsibilities:', 'C1+ Yield Engineering:', 'Requirements:', '', 'Hiring Manager : Kok Wah', 'GJS : E1-E4', 'Working Location : 1, North Coast Drive. 757432', "

Title: Market Development Manager, Emerging Markets, APAC
Description: ['Position Summary:', 'Illumina’s mission is to improve human health by unlocking the power of the genome. As the established global leader in DNA sequencing our people and our technology change lives by driving advancements in clinical genomics. Clinical Genomics serves as one of Illumina’s largest, most important and fastest growing markets. As a key member of the Market Development team, this individual will be responsible to develop, implement and actively manage the market development strategies for next generation sequencing (NGS) across a variety of emerging market segments, such as cardiology, infectious disease and other translational clinical applications in the region. Ideal candidates will combine strong scientific knowledge of genomics in the translational research setting with an understanding of how discoveries are being translated into widespread application of NGS. In this position the candidate would have the opportunity to collaborate across multi-disciplinary teams and cultivate key partnerships with KOLs enabling customers to access our technology, as the clinical markets that NGS serve, expand further.', 'Key Deliverables:', 'Tasks and Responsibilities:', 'Preferred Educational Background:', 'Preferred Experience & Skills:', '', '']

Title: ISM MATERIALS FORECAST PROFESSIONAL (12 months Contract)
Description:
['', 'Req. ID: 120651\xa0', '(This is a 12 months contract role)', '', 'Job Description', 'The Inbound Supply Management group (ISM) is a progressive department in Global Procurement focusing on tactical management of raw materials and spares supply, using the forecasting, inventory management, and supply fulfillment skill sets. As an ISM Materials Forecasting Professional, you will be in position to collaborate with both local site and global teams located at all Front End and Back End manufacturing locations to drive significant value to the organization. This is an established role within the Global Procurement department, blending Supply Chain Planning and Procurement paradigms, and provides a unique platform for transformation.', '', 'The ISM Forecasting team will focus on the aggregated summary of global materials requirements, the sources of the signals, the calculation and platform utilized, and their interdependent constraints. The goal of this team is to drive the optimization and standardization of centralized forecasting signals and materials requirements schedules to our business partners encompassing all internal Front End and Back End manufacturing locations.', '', 'Collaborating with ISM Materials Management, GSM teams, success will be defined as a transparent, responsive, efficient, and well aligned supply support process. This process must be positioned to support the company’s manufacturing sites and to enable hitting the fluctuating demand plan of record and in parallel work inside our working capital thresholds. This success will manifest itself across ISM areas in a significantly lower count of purchase order expedites and escalations, low instances of factory down time due to materials availability, increased inventory turns, high on time delivery.', '', 'In this role, you be a key player in developing and executing a holistic improvement strategy for your designated manufacturing location, while collaborating with similar sites to encompass a unified approach. You will have a shared responsibility in the team to help develop the improvement strategy by supporting an assessment of current and future needs and identify opportunities to leverage changes in processes and systems.', '', 'Role Responsibilities & Tasks ', '​Forecasting Execution', '', 'Process Enhancement ', '', 'Infrastructure Development ', 'Play a key role in MRP system development/implementation/maintenance and user testing activities', 'Standardized centralized Forecasting signal, material schedules across all sites', 'Develop solutions for 100% material solve on Capability-To-Match (CTM) runs', '', 'Competencies ', 'The following are the key behaviors supporting the success of the ISM Materials Forecast Professional role.\xa0', '', 'Job Essential ', 'Critical to role; can be developed over time or may have at point of hire', '', 'Differentiating ', '', 'Global Focus Areas ', '', 'Skills ', 'The following are the key functional skills supporting the success of the ISM Materials Forecast Professional role.', '', 'Education ', 'Required: Bachelor’s Degree with related field of study', '', 'Qualifications ', '1-2 years’ experience in any of the following:', '', '\xa0Experiences ', 'The following are examples of experiences to help prepare a team member for the ISM Materials Forecast Professional role.', '', 'Location: \xa0MSB - 990 Bendemeer Road, Singapore 339942', '', "
 We recruit, hire, train, promote, discipline and provide other conditions of employment without regard to a person's race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity and expression, pregnancy, veteran’s status, or other classifications protected under law. \xa0This includes providing reasonable accommodation for team members' disabilities or religious beliefs and practices.", '
 Each manager, supervisor and team member is responsible for carrying out this policy. The EEO Administrator in Human Resources is responsible for administration of this policy. The administrator will monitor compliance and is available to answer any questions on EEO matters.', '
 To request assistance with the application process, please contact Micron’s Human Resources Department at 1-800-336-8918 (or 208-368-4748).', '
 Keywords: \xa0Singapore || Central Singapore (SG-01) || Singapore (SG) || Supply Chain || Experienced || CONT || Materials/Purchasing || #LI-KL1 ||

Title: Concierge
Description: ['RESPONSIBILITIES', '1. Be able to perform check-in and checkout processes utilizing established systems and procedures including appropriately allocating rooms to guests, confirming and executing account payment in accordance with the established credit procedures. This includes ensuring that floats balance at the completion of each shift.', '2. Register guest in the Property Management System (OPERA). Record and update all pertinent data into guest folio as needed.', '3. Handles guest’s inquiries pertaining to tourist information and local community.', '4. Processes Concierge and Ticketing related requests.', '5. Competent to operate FCS system, Property Management System (OPERA), and Go Concierge to assist and process with guest requests.', '6. Be conversant with manual operations process during shutdown of property management system.', '7. Monitor activities in the hotel lobby and report and suspicious characters, items or/and activities to the Assistant Chef Concierge and Concierge Supervisor.', '8. Maintain close liaison with all other Departments and to have a good understanding of other Departments’ operational flow, thus ensuring seamless guest experiences.', '9. Be familiar with the local community and major events in town. Appropriate recommendations can be made to guests to enhance their stay in MBS and Singapore.', '10. Be aware of OSHA (Occupational Safety and Health Act) and practice safety guidelines.', '11. Adhere to departmental and organizational benchmarking standards.', '12. Supports the Guest Services team with desk operations as and when required.', '13. Performs any other duties and responsibilities as and when assigned by the management.', '', 'JOB REQUIREMENTS', '1. Certificate or Diploma in Hospitality Operations from a recognized institution preferred.', '2. Prior experience in the same capacity is an advantage.', '3. Excellent guest relations and communication skills.', '4. Fluent in English, knowledge of additional languages such as Japanese, Putonghua, Korean is an added advantage.', '5. Pay attention to details and have strong customer service skills.', '6. Is eager to acquire tourist-related knowledge in Singapore.', '7. Able to work with minimum supervision.', '8. A team player and takes initiative to assist others Team Members when required.', '9. Have impeccable follow-through; and “Can Do” attitude and mindset.', '10. Well groomed and professional disposition.']

Qualification: 'N' Levels / 'O' Levels, ITE/ NITEC/ Higher NITEC, 'A' Levels, Diploma, Bachelor's / Honours, Masters / PhD
Title: Intern Tech I
Description: ['', 'Job Description', '', 'x1149 Boundary Scan Analyzer is a tool for engineers to perform structural test such as opens and shorts tests on their PCBAs. x1149 programs PROM devices as well as execute memory verification tests on devices such as DDR SDRAMs. Being fully compliant to the IEEE 1149.1 standard, the x1149 can provide test coverage for much of a PCBA with boundary scan devices. In addition to that, the innovative Cover-Extend Technology enables test coverage to go beyond just IEEE 1149.1 devices - to also include connectors, sockets and non IEEE1149.1 device. Keysight x1149 also supports the IEEE 1149.6 standard for AC-coupled bus lines.', 'The Insert Source Language (ISL) is used to develop application-specific functionality in standard Keysight x1149 Boundary-Scan tests. It combines device-agnostic features of Serial Vector Format (SVF) with a higher-level, device-aware representation of Standard Test and Programming Language (STAPL) functionality. With knowledge of the devices in a chain, Keysight x1149 software translates the higher-level, device-aware statements—as well as SVF—into low-level (STAPL) test code. Each standard test has Pre-Test and Post-Test insert-source sections that can be used to perform application-specific initialization and clean-up tasks. An initialization-related example of this is configuring an onboard linker mux. The device-aware ABSCHAIN, ABSIR, and ABSDR statements simplify this task by allowing the test engineer to work with a device and its instructions by name. Clean-up tasks, such as powering down devices in a safe order, can also be performed. Frame-based tests also have a Pre-Frame insert-source section, and custom tests have an insert-source section for their custom code.', 'This internship project involves a smart ISL GUI editor tool development in Keysight X1149 Boundary Scan Analyzer software application. The editor tool represents all ISL syntax in more intuitive way, by providing many enhanced features e.g. error checking, data visualizer, smart mapping etc., and change the conventional way of editing the ISL in the software.\xa0 Consequently, this tool helps customers to improve test development and debugging process. This project requires good analytical knowledge to translate the requirements into software design and implementation. Candidate will involve in all stages of software development life cycle (SDLC) from user analysis, software system design, development, testing to documentation. As part of the R&D organization, candidate is encouraged to contribute creative and innovative ideas in software design.', '', '', '', 'Job Qualifications', '', 'Object-oriented programming (OOP), C#, WPF, MVVM and design patterns.']

Title: Software Program Engineer (Quality Assurance) - 12 Months contract
Indirect Procurement Manager (Global / Regional Logistics and Transportation; Chemical MNC)
Description:
['', ' Global Indirect Procurement Manager 
(Focused on Global Freight Forwarding & Logistics Category; Chemical MNC with Global HQ based in Singapore) ', '', ' 
Responsibilities:

- To further optimize all freight, logistics and warehousing procurement process globally, enhance cooperation and coordination with global SCM team, production site and business team. To increase overall procurement team’s capability from both management and professional perspectives.

• Design, develop, support and implement global/regional strategies to optimize freight, logistics and warehousing costs for all global entities.

• Integrate and optimize global/regional process to gain leverage on global freight and logistics spend with good understanding of service provider pricing mechanism

• Evaluate current and potential suppliers to develops strategies that will sustain competitive advantage and continuously improve safety, process, complexity, cost, quality and delivery performance

• Leading commercial negotiations to achieve annual saving targets, incl. Payment terms, INCO terms, etc. for all freight, logistics and warehouse spend.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0

• Define new contract logistics, freight forwarding and 4PL suppliers and developing alternative suppliers by co-working with SCM team and production site upon business needs

• Supplier management incl. supplier audit on annual basis and supplier evaluation

• Multi-task project management ', '', ' Requirements:

• Degree in Chemistry, Supply Chain/Logistics Management or Engineering preferred

• At least 8 years of relevant experiences in chemical industry preferred with good network and experiences in global freight and logistics procurement

• Diligent, pro-active, self-motivation, self-confident, open-minded and out-going. Able to work independently and lead in a cross-cultural and fast paced environment.

• Good interpersonal, communications, negotiation and problem-solving skills

• Strong leadership skill and Strong logical thinking and analytical ability

• Fluent in both English and local languages

• Good computer skill; Analytical software, SAP and Office package ', '', ' Selected candidate will be awarded with a competitive compensation package and a rewarding career.

Please click "Apply" to submit your application with your full cv and include your current/last drawn salary, expected salary, your availability/notice period, motivation factors for your next career move and a recent passport size photo.

For any enquiries, please write to meisee(a)thameshr.com (Reg No. R1105612) ', '', ' We thank you for your interest in this application and regret that only short-listed candidates are notified. ', '']
