Title: Backend MQE Quality Engineer
Description:
['', 'Req. ID: 120497\xa0', 'As an MQE Quality Engineer at Micron Central Team (Backend)., you will be a member of the worldwide Quality Team responsible for reducing variation and deviation for all Micron backend (BE) sites.\xa0 You will be responsible for providing support and guidance in quality methodologies and projects with emphasis on FMEA and QMS.\xa0 You will be expected to collaborate with leadership and MFG teams to further develop and continuously improve the FMEA and QMS business process to enhance overall quality for products and processes in Micron’s BE operations.', '', 'To do this, you will help coordinate the FMEA business alignment team (BAT) for worldwide BE operations.\xa0 Your objective is the coordination of global alignment efforts for FMEA; documenting requirements and standards to be utilized by all sites.\xa0 You will interpret analytic findings and communicate insights to operations, engineering, and management for data-driven decision making.\xa0 Your efforts will drive improvements to our BE FMEA business process on a global scale.', '', 'You will also support QMS by driving alignment of QMS business processes across the BE network and support certifications and audits by working with Global Process owners and stewards in the BE.', 'This position requires a broad working knowledge and application of principles, theories, and concepts in applicable disciplines.\xa0 You will be required to interface with functional areas of the Backend MCT CPEE manufacturing sites, key process groups, R&D, Corporate/Site Quality Engineering and other peer groups for effective collaboration to drive solutions to area manufacturing improvements.\xa0 You must also be willing and capable of international travel and the interaction with multinational and cross functional teams, as needed, to accomplish your objectives.\xa0 You may be required to develop and/or teach courses.', '', 'Required', 'Bachelor Degree or equivalent experience in any of the following', 'Required', '5 years experience in Assembly, Test or MOD/SSD lines for any of the following:\xa0', 'Desired - Experience with Omnex Systems Ewims FMEA software', 'Travel Required?', 'Travel Details', '', 'Working Location: 1 North Coast Drive, Singapore 757432', "
 We recruit, hire, train, promote, discipline and provide other conditions of employment without regard to a person's race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity and expression, pregnancy, veteran’s status, or other classifications protected under law. \xa0This includes providing reasonable accommodation for team members' disabilities or religious beliefs and practices.", '
 Each manager, supervisor and team member is responsible for carrying out this policy. The EEO Administrator in Human Resources is responsible for administration of this policy. The administrator will monitor compliance and is available to answer any questions on EEO matters.', '
 To request assistance with the application process, please contact Micron’s Human Resources Department at 1-800-336-8918 (or 208-368-4748).', '

Title: ORDER FULFILLMENT ANALYST
Description:
['', 'Req. ID: 120031\xa0', 'Description', 'As an Order Fulfillment Analyst at Micron, you will be responsible for coordinating the scheduling and shipment of customer orders. You will analyze shipping requirements and rules against available inventories to ensure the appropriate products are delivered while striving to meet promise dates. You will coordinate repositioning of products to the appropriate distribution points, respond to delinquent or unconfirmed orders, and investigate delivery performance issues. You may work directly with internal customers to provide product samples and can expect to coordinate with the Sales, Planning, and Quality Assurance departments in scheduling the delivery of targeted or at-risk products and identifying alternative product delivery options. Additionally you will be required to monitor the scheduling and order management systems to identify problems, notify the affected departments or resources, and ensure resolution is obtained. In this role you can expect to work with team members and customers around the world dealing with varying languages, cultures, and geographies', '', 'Responsibilities', '', 'Requirements', '', 'Location: \xa0MSB – 990 Bendemeer Road, Singapore 339942', '', "

Title: Customer Experience Officer (Ticketing)
Description:
['As a Customer Experience Officer,
Ticketing, you will liaise with Ticketing agents and internal departments for configuration
of Esplanade events. You will also have to manage and facilitate group and
school bookings.', 'EVENTS CONFIGURATION', '', 'SCHOOL / GROUP BOOKING ', '\xa0', "You must have at
least a Diploma with 2 to 3 years' working experience in a customer service
role. A good pass in English and Mathematics and proficiency in Microsoft
Office applications will be ideal. Experience in cashiering, reservations,
ticketing or handling point of sales activities is an advantage. The ability to
communicate fluently in English and a second language (whether Mandarin, Malay
or Tamil) is a must.", 'In performing your
duties, you must have empathy and lots of patience in managing customers,
flexibility and resourcefulness in handling the unexpected and the ability to
think on your feet to resolve operational issues. ', '\xa0', 'We invite you to
email us your resume with an indication of your current and expected salary if
you are keen to join us as a Customer Experience Officer. Only shortlisted
candidates will be notified.\xa0 We thank
you for your interest in the position and in the Esplanade.']

Title: SG – Senior Manager
Description:
['The challenges and opportunities of a continuously evolving business make leadership at the Apple Store a rewarding career. It’s your job as a Senior Manager to lead the staff and operations of one or more store areas and seek solutions and results that create a high-performing work environment. By reading situations quickly and acting courageously, you are able to build success for the business and promote the Apple brand through unparalleled customer service.

', 'As a Senior Manager, you guide other leaders to inspire top performance from their teams. You monitor multiple lines of business within the store to achieve operational objectives and collaborate with corporate business partners to report results. You’re knowledgeable about the industry and keep up to date on competitors and trends. You lead the sales and customer support teams by example, finding solutions to create and maintain a high level of customer focus. To foster growth among your staff, you coach and encourage with clear communications. By developing strong relationships across teams and with customers, you create an environment that enhances loyalty to Apple products and services.

']

Title: Butler - Hotel Services
Description: ['JOB SCOPE\xa0', 'Attend to the needs and wants of the guests and ensure that they are fulfilled according to the set standards and to guest’s satisfaction\xa0', 'Anticipate guest needs, respond promptly, maintain positive guest relations and ensure guest satisfaction at all times\xa0', 'Service and clean all butler suites and rooms as well as provide turndown services\xa0\xa0', 'Handle floral set-up as well as daily amenity arrangements for all butler suites and rooms\xa0', 'Review in-house, arriving and departing guest suites and rooms on a daily basis\xa0', 'Be familiar with the set-up and functionality of all equipment in the suites\xa0', 'Perform meet and greet and send off process according to the set standard\xa0', 'Be able to escort guests from the front of the hotel to the suites and serve the guests as needed including hotel tour, suite tour, explanation of services, unpacking and packing luggage\xa0', 'Take orders for in suite dining, deliver and serve accordingly\xa0', 'Respond to guest requests and queries promptly and professionally according to set standard\xa0', 'Attend to service the suites, including food and beverage service, restocking product, equipment and supplies\xa0', 'Attend to laundry, dry cleaning, ironing, mending and shoe polishing as needed\xa0', 'Run errands for guest as assigned including shopping, entertainment and flight ticket purchase, food purchase, deliveries and packages\xa0', 'Pick up and record all pertinent data, guest preferences into guest profile as needed\xa0', 'Fulfill guest requirements as long as they are safe, legal and economically sound\xa0', 'Demonstrate an enjoyment and enthusiasm for work through effective relationships with other Team Members/ Department by adopting a “can do” approach to tasks\xa0', 'Maintain positive relations with colleagues, internal / external departments\xa0\xa0', 'Able to respond to emergencies including fire safety and evacuation procedures\xa0', 'Monitor activities in both front and back of the house, report any suspicious characters, items or/and activities to the Supervisor and/or Assistant Manager\xa0', 'Practice safety guidelines as prescribed by Occupational Safety and Health Act (OSHA)\xa0', 'Perform administrative duties such as inventory and filing of reports as required\xa0', 'Attend training sessions as and when scheduled\xa0', 'Be updated with the major events and latest happenings within the property and in town in order to provide appropriate recommendations to guest\xa0', 'Contribute to the improvement of the department\xa0', 'JOB REQUIREMENTS\xa0', 'Minimum GCE “N” or “O” levels or equivalent vocational school certificate\xa0', 'Certificate or Diploma in Hospitality Management from a recognized institution is an advantage\xa0', 'Experience in a similar capacity in a 5-star hotel is preferred\xa0', 'Excellent guest relations and communication skills\xa0', 'Advanced understanding of food and beverage including in-suite dining, wine and spirits\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'Fluent in English and any additional language is an advantage\xa0', 'Must have exceptional customer service skills and pays attention to details\xa0', 'Must have good command of written and spoken English\xa0\xa0', 'Possess good general knowledge of current events in Singapore\xa0', 'Able to work with minimum supervision\xa0\xa0', 'Willing to perform shift work and work irregular hours.\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'Well-groomed\xa0and professional disposition\xa0', '\xa0']

Title: Manufacturing Portfolio Management Office (MPMO) Project Manager
Description: ['Req Id: 116902\xa0', 'As a Manufacturing\xa0Portfolio Management Office (MPMO) you are a member of\xa0Manufacturing Central Team (M) within Micron Technology, Inc. You will be responsible for driving Micron benchmark performance through Network partnerships in portfolio, program, and project management. You will also drive the organizational change and performance by taking ownership of opportunities and leading diverse global teams in the innovation of solutions that will pave the way for achieving Micron objectives now and in the future.Your primary goal is to realize program and project objectives which require the advanced application of project and process management concepts. This includes planning, organizing, staffing, leading, executing, and controlling activities to deliver expected value.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0', '', '', '', '', 'Preferred', 'Travel Required?', '']

Title: Embedded Software Engineer
Computer Vision Software Engineer
Description: ['As a Computer VIsion Software Engineer at Trakomatic, you’ll be responsible for adapting video analytics algorithms and AI models from our in-house R&D department into production-grade software applications. Applications will vary between robust backend services and robust presentation-grade technology demonstration applications.', 'Responsibilities:', 'Develop user-centric intuitive Software to benefit our customers.', 'Work closely with product managers, designers, QA Testers and Support personnel.', 'Timely delivery with professionalism and quality.', 'Follow Clean Coding standards and maintain repository etiquette.', 'Lead team of software engineers.', 'Drive software development initiative with the team to ship high quality software fast.', '\n', 'Requirements:', "Candidate must possess at least Bachelor's Degree in Engineering (Computer/Telecommunication), Computer Science/Information Technology or equivalent.", 'At least 5 Year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position.', 'Required Expert Skill(s): Expertise in C++, .NET C#, Windows Platform. ', 'Required Intermediate Skill(s): Ubuntu skills, Python.', 'Experience working with computer vision algorithms, OpenCV library, Matlab Runtime, machine learning and deep learning.', 'Good experience in Debugging, Reverse Engineering and Porting code.', 'Good experience in Memory and Processor cycle optimization.', 'Strong leadership qualities.', 'Good communication and team player.', 'Willing to take on large challenges and work on cutting-edge technologies.']

Title: Software Deployment Engineer
Description:
['In line with our expansion and quest for quality excellence, we are looking for qualified and talented individuals to join as:

', '', 'SOFTWARE DEPLOYMENT ENGINEER

', '', 'Qualifications', '1) Some knowledge of modifications/coding for PHP, html, CSS, image manipulations and able to\xa0 
\xa0 \xa0 work with SQLs.', '2) Knowing other programming languages like java, python, ruby is additional plus', '3) Basic knowledge scripts in linux based environment eg. bash, perl etc', '4) Basic Knowledge of LAN and WAN technologies.', '5) Ability to work in a fast paced, dynamic environment.\xa0', '6) Good time organisation and management.', '7) Excellent customer service, organization and communications skills.

', ' ', 'Scope of Work', '1) Work closely with multiple teams for software development, integration and deployment of 
\xa0 \xa0 ANTlabs product customisations to fulfill customer requirements.', '2) Need to work with customer to gather required deployment/customizations required.', '3) Handling of customer enquiries.', '4) Ensure good quality of work delivered and on time.', '5) Support software customisations via enhancing, bug fixing and code corrections.', '6) Need to conduct handover and trainings to internal or external parties.', '7) Required to document customisations and changes required for external and internal use.', '8) Required to travel for projects when necessary.\xa0']

Title: R&D Software Engineer - C++, Computer Vision, Machine Learning, Deep Learning
Description: ['Responsibilities:  ', 'We are a strong start-up based in Singapore, working on computer vision and machine learning applied to videos. We have developed our own computer vision/ machine learning algorithm and systems platform to detect anomalies in videos and we have already analysed at least a few hundred thousand hours of surveillance video in real time and are quickly expanding worldwide. ', 'The company consists of people with varying backgrounds and nationalities worldwide including PhDs with deep technical expertise. Technical competence and strong practical implementation skills related to software development is highly regarded, along with the ability to work in a team. ', 'The engineer will be responsible for working on the intersection of computer vision and machine learning, in order to bring our products to the next level with new features and capabilities. It involves adapting and trying out the state of the art. We expect a baseline level of implementation capability as we believe that it is fundamental to iterating quickly on research ideas and also have a realistic appreciation of the state of the art methods in real life deployment scenarios. ', 'General Requirements:  ', '\uf0b7 Any Bachelors with coursework in programming and mathematical subjects. Masters/PhD are preferred. ', '\uf0b7 A solid programming and implementation baseline in C++ is essential. ', '\uf0b7 Additional experience in Python / .NET is desirable. ', '\uf0b7 Good fundamentals in algorithms and data structures. ', '\uf0b7 Some mathematical background (e.g. linear algebra, probability, optimization). ', '\uf0b7 Good problem solving skills, with a rigorous approach to engineering. ', '\uf0b7 Intuition and experience in deep learning. ', '', 'Interested candidates please send in an updated Word CV with a recent photograph attached to ', '[Click Here to Email Your Resume]\nEA License: 10C3108', 'EA Registration No: R1106538', '']

Title: Full Stack Software Developer
Description: ['', 'Job Description', '', "Keysight Technologies has been unlocking electronic measurement insights for 75 years. We are the world's leading electronic measurement company, transforming today's measurement experience through innovation in wireless, modular, and software solutions. With our HP and Agilent legacy, our 9,500 Keysight employees serve customers in more than 100 countries, delivering solutions in wireless communications, aerospace and defense and semiconductor markets with world class platforms, software and consistent measurement solutions.", 'Keysight Singapore Center of Excellence is a new software development center in Singapore, chartered to create a new generation of software for electronic product design and test for customers around the world. With strong collaborations & partnerships with local universities here in Singapore, the center will attract top local graduates from computer science, artificial intelligence, systems programming and electrical/electronic/computer engineering schools.', 'In our software team, DTS (Design and Test Software), it is our goal to be the undisputed leader in electronic product software solutions across the customers’ workflow from early design through manufacturing test.\xa0 We are recruiting experienced software engineers with the skills, background and drive to help bring our visions forward and deliver them to our customers. The team operates in a fast-paced environment that focuses on technology to drive business objectives.', 'The ideal candidate should have over 5 years of software engineering experience in pc-based development, using a variety of standard tools with a creative edge and strong problem-solving skills. The candidate must be able to design, develop, document, test, and maintain software with high levels of quality and performance. The engineer must be self-directed and ensure the software delivered matches the customers’ needs. The individual should be comfortable with direct communication with all levels of technical and business resources and work collaboratively with worldwide teams.', 'Responsibilities', 'As our Software Engineer, your roles & responsibilities are as below:', '', '', '', 'Job Qualifications', '', '', 'Preferred', '', '', '', 'Job Function', '', 'R&D', '', '', '', '', 'Shift:']

Title: Senior SSD Security Firmware Engineer
Description:
['', 'Req. ID: 116401\xa0', 'As a Firmware Engineer at Micron Technology, Inc., you will develop high-performance controller firmware for innovative volatile and non-volatile memory systems. In this position, you will assist in evaluating, designing, building, bench testing, debugging, and failure analyzing firmware for new high-performance memory controllers and Solid State Drives that will increase performance, while reducing power, latency and SoC (System on Chip) complexity for the target markets. You can expect to work closely with system test engineers, system failure analysis engineers, firmware engineers, firmware test engineers, system hardware design engineers, product engineers, memory design engineers, firmware tools developers, and production engineers to solve cross-functional product development issues.', '', 'Responsibilities include, but are not limited to the following:', '', 'Successful candidates will have the following:', '', 'Education:', 'BS or MS in Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or Computer Science.', '', 'Working Location: 990 Bendemeer, Singapore 339942', "
 We recruit, hire, train, promote, discipline and provide other conditions of employment without regard to a person's race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity and expression, pregnancy, veteran’s status, or other classifications protected under law. \xa0This includes providing reasonable accommodation for team members' disabilities or religious beliefs and practices.", '
 Each manager, supervisor and team member is responsible for carrying out this policy. The EEO Administrator in Human Resources is responsible for administration of this policy. The administrator will monitor compliance and is available to answer any questions on EEO matters.', '
 To request assistance with the application process, please contact Micron’s Human Resources Department at 1-800-336-8918 (or 208-368-4748).', '

Title: Solution Integration Engineer
Description:
['', ' We are hiring for one of the position of\xa0exclusive position for Solution Integration Engineer role who has very strong experience in solution integration/delivering, testing and interfacing with one of our leading client in Singapore.

Salary: SGD 6000– SGD 8,000  ', ' Location – Singapore ', ' 1 year renewable contract ', ' Designation – Solution Integration Engineer', ' Job Description:\xa0 ', '\xa0', ' Requirements', ' ● \xa08-10 years’ experience in solution integration/delivering, testing, and interfacing with customers. ', ' ● \xa0Exceptional organizational skills, meticulous attention to detail, and the ability to maintain focus in fast paced environment. ', ' ● \xa0Ability to thoroughly document the custom solution down to API calls. ', ' ● \xa0Formulate and execute integration tests, load tests, and performance tests. ', ' ● \xa0Strong knowledge of APIs, SDKs, scripting, and ETL. ', ' ● \xa0Understanding of Web Services, Internet architecture, SQL, and software development. ', ' ● \xa0Self-motivated and self-managed with a high degree of dependability. ', ' ● \xa0Excellent communication skills. ', " ● \xa0Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or other supportive program, or commensurate technology industry experience preferred.", ' Responsibilities', ' ● \xa0Be a team player with the energy, drive, and excitement to help grow a fast moving company. ', ' ● \xa0Interface directly with enterprise clients to integrate their mobile, web, e-commerce, and point of sale applications with our APIs/SDKs and custom features. ', ' ● \xa0Manage the technical customer relationship for all facets of the integration including, but not limited to, requirements clarification, integration testing, load testing, giving demos, upgrading software, and responding to Customer needs for technical information. ', ' ● \xa0Work closely with product and engineering in delivering enterprise-level solutions to customers through problem solving, testing, and code delivery.

 ', '', ' Interested, please send over your resume to recruitment at Aryan Search dot com or call at T +65 67087429 Ext 203 for a confidential discussion. ', '']

Title: NVE - Senior/Product Engineer (3DxP)
Description:
['', 'Req. ID: 113971\xa0', 'Job Descriptions: \xa0\xa0', 'As a Product Engineer, you will be responsible for device, speed interface and memory array characterization, electrical and physical failure analysis, validating functionality and reliability of 3DxP devices using automated engineering or production test equipment. You will develop new test coverage, and characterize, validate and debug functionality of the 3DxP devices in high volume manufacturing, and also to use 3DxP media management to validate component failure. You will be required to statistically analyze test data as part of the failure analysis to determine the area of concern and provide feedback to design or affected manufacturing area. Prior work experience as product, probe, yield enhancement, or test engineers working with memory technology will be advantageous. Looking for experienced candidates to fill the following areas.', '', 'Responsibilities:', 'Requirements:', "

Job Summary:', 'The role will be responsible for building up an IT security engineering practice within the organization. In this role, he is responsible for developing and maintaining the security engineering practices and maintain a level IT security competency within the organization.\xa0 He/She will oversee the proper execution of security practices within IT development project being undertaken in the organization. He/She will provide advice to both internal and external customers regarding technical issues, security risks and business impacts, as well as participate in the broader Information Security governance process with IT and Security leadership.', ' ', '
Responsibilities:
•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Oversee the security aspects of implementation projects', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Manage security analysts and engineers', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Oversee and improve security practices in the improvement of system engineering processes ', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Interact with peers in other departments achieve higher level of security engineering within projects', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Mentor and guide junior security analysts and engineers', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Raise the general awareness and knowledge of IT security engineering practices within the organization', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Advice and assist in the resolution of IT security issues in the projects', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Assist with the planning and management and development of IT security resources', ' ', '

Title: Audiovisual Programmer - Singapore
Description:
['Overview', 'Based in our Singapore office the AV Programmer will be in charge of all software aspects of installation works.\xa0\xa0', '', 'The Role', 'Working alongside with a team of engineers to install AV projects globally. The job entails design, programming and commissioning of all aspects of an AV system, including (but not limited) to the following: AV control system, Firmware, Hardware setting and programming, Interface programming, User Interface, IoT….etc. The AV Programmer will have to work closely with clients on the requirement and deliverables. They will also be expected to perform on-site/off-site commissioning, provide technical support and onsite training to end users.\xa0 

', 'The ideal candidate will have a number of years’ experience in this field, will have experience of running small teams, have proved good customer services skills, be able to prioritize work, to think laterally to find solutions to technical issues on-site and be able to work under pressure.\xa0 Must be willing to travel on projects. Must speak English. 
', '', 'How to Apply', 'Please send CV and cover letter to [Click Here to Email Your Resume]', '', 'Further Contact Details', 'T:\xa0 (65) 6694 4118 Ext 104', 'W: www.pixelglobalav.com
', '', 'We can offer you a friendly team environment as well as a competitive salary plus benefits.\xa0']

Title: Toughbook Presales Engineer at Panasonic Systems Asia Pacific
Description: ['Panasonic pre sales engineer serves as a technology adviser to both prospective customers, partners and representatives of currently assigned client accounts', 'Assist sales through ensuring product confidence and technology leadership of Panasonic Toughbook, display a strong commitment to developing and maintaining customer relationships with ability to understand customer requirement, determine the best solutions and effectively communicate the value proposition', 'Contribute to enhance internal sales team’s as well as key partner’s knowledge on products and core technologies through regular training and sales tools build reliability ', 'Working closely with MSBD/PSNM to solve any technical in both presales/post sales support for customers to suggest best solutions in required timeline', 'Improve post sales support and SVC process for ASEAN, Israel Toughbook business across the region', 'Job Requirements', 'Technology/engineering diploma or above or a combination of relevant education and experience on engineering, computer science, IT technology and systems, networking, various OS and android platform with laptops, tablets and mobile devices', 'Both hardware and software, relevant MDM solutions knowledge is essential', 'Proven technology skills, outstanding interpersonal abilities, and strong written and verbal communication and presentation skills to face with customers']

Title: GQ - PACKAGE RELIABILITY SENIOR ENGINEER
Description:
['', 'Req. ID: 101864\xa0', 'Description:', 'As a GQ (Global Quality) Package Reliability Engineer at Micron Technology Inc., you will be responsible for package quality and reliability for one of Micron’s product lines. This responsibility includes coordinating package qualification efforts for new products and when new designs, materials, or processes are introduced; and providing recommendations on product release based on package reliability test results. You will also be expected to devise reliability test plans to assess risk associated with excursions, conversions, and reliability and qualification issues. You will coordinate root cause and corrective action efforts within the GQ department for package related qualification failures and RMA’s, and prepare reports for discussion. Additional duties include providing support to internal and external customers for package-related quality and reliability issues, and customer requests.', '', 'Successful Candidates for this position will have:', '', 'Qualification Requirements: ', '', 'Location: MSB - 990 Bendemeer Road, Singapore 339942', "
 We recruit, hire, train, promote, discipline and provide other conditions of employment without regard to a person's race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity and expression, pregnancy, veteran’s status, or other classifications protected under law. \xa0This includes providing reasonable accommodation for team members' disabilities or religious beliefs and practices.", '

Title: Vulnerability Management System Engineer
Description: ['', ' Our client is a leading global IT solutions company. One of their key customers has kick started a regional project and in need to hire an: ', ' Vulnerability Management System Engineer ', ' This job description is intended as a guide to the general job responsibilities and is not inclusive of every duty that the employee is expected to perform', ' ● \xa0Experience in vulnerability assessment services', ' ● \xa0Good to have Nessus, Nexpose or equivalent ', " ● \xa0Bachelor's degree in a related field and/or a minimum of 3-5+ years of experience in performing vulnerability assessments ", ' ● \xa0Technical network (e.g. CCNA, CCNP Security) and security certifications highly desirable ', ' ● \xa0Understanding of controls (e.g. access control, auditing, authentication, encryption, integrity, physical security, and application security). ', ' ● \xa0Must be well versed in operating systems such as Linux as well as Windows environments, Active Directory, VPN systems, encryption schemas and algorithms, various authorization and authentication mechanisms/software, network monitoring and sniffing, TCP/IP networks and vulnerability and threat management tools (including network based scanners). ', ' ● \xa0Experience using Nessus and/or Retina as the primary vulnerability scanners ', ' ● \xa0A solid understanding of network design and architecture ', ' ● \xa0Experience in scripting and powershell ', ' ● \xa0Expert understanding of the OSI model and TCP/IP ', ' All interested applicants should send their resume to: sara (at) aryansearch (dot) com', ' Only shortlisted applicants will be notified.', ' EA Registration number: R1103286', ' Licensee: Aryan Search Pte Ltd / License No. 13C6405', ' For all other jobs, visit: www.aryansearch.com/jobs']
